sadānanda puruṣa tu abhaẏe sadāśiba | 13 |
samaste nirekha tuhi se sabong ṭāṇa
sapata prahmaṇḍe tora meṇṭantā nāhiṁ āna | 14 |

div.note: śahasra bidyāre tu sahasra arjuna, saudāsara darpa dhvaṁsu
śahasra bidyāre tu sahasrā arjuna śūra darpa dhvaṁsu | (pā)
bhūa–pr̥thibi, bā pañchabhūta 5|2 puruṣa asakanda–puruṣa rāja, puruṣa śreṣṭha<lb/>(skanda–rājā)
pādaka antaka–pādakara yama–pātaka antaka–pāpa bā pāpī nāśakārī

lg.l: aṁśābatāre deba ananta koṭi mūrtti
praśurāma abatāre nāhiṁnā ān chatrī | 15 |
rāga na sahilu nātha pitāra nimante
kṣatrī anta kalu nātha ẏekoiśa bāra pariyante | 16 |
kebaṇa yoga baḷe svamī batilā tora nāma
mahā bhaẏe upujilā nāma praśurāma | 17 |
aneka pātaka deba tora draśane bhaṁjā
durita nibāraṇa nātha nāśakara darpagañjā | 18 |
yābata candra ye dibākara brati thāu
paśurāma nāma goṭi mora hr̥de rahu | 19 |
janme janme bhābaiṁ muhiṁ taba padma pāẏe
śudramuni sāroḷā dāsa sebai praśurāma dhyāẏe | 20–3571 |

div.head: {@droṇaṅkara hastinā āgamana, kr̥paṅka ghare bāsa<lb/>o gurupada lābha@}

lg.l: badaẏanti agasti śuṇa baibasuta manu
praśurāmaṅka bandanā kale bhāradvādaśaṅka tanu | 1 |
samasta bidyā dile se jamadaagniṅka śiṣi
bidyā sārthuka hoile droṇa mahāruṣi | 2 |
śasramāna ghenile guru droṇe
ẏe yebe prā prāpata hoilā nā jāṇimā ẏethira kāraṇe | 3 |

div.note: “ẏe yebe prāpata hoilā nā jāṇimā ẏethira kāraṇe” padānta<lb/>pare ‘anya’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
jaẏa tu sarasvatī go biṣṇura pāṭarāṇī
beda bharata tu jāta kalu padma yoni |
śveta badanī go śukla barṇṇa jyoti

lg.l: kāśī deśaru mā go hoilu utapatti |
dr̥pada ye āmbhanta dilā aneka śāsti
śarīre byathā pāilu aneka durgati | 4 |
saṅgrāma karibu āmbhe dr̥padara tule
yuddha kari na pāribu ẏe bāḷuta putra thile | 5 |
hastināẏe achanti ye kr̥pa nāme āchāryye
tāhāra ghare nei chāḍibā bāḷuta ātmaje | 6 |
putra ruhāi āsibu pañchāḷa deśe
dr̥padara tule yuddha karibu nirāśe | 7 |
ẏeteka bichāri se gale hastināku
karapatre dhanu troṇe kākhe ghenile aśastamāku | 8 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ kr̥pa āchāryyaṅka ghare
dekhiṇa āchāryye āśrita hoile saniddhare | 9 |
kr̥pāchāryya puchākale bhagniki nadekhi
saṅgare tumbhe kiṁpā na āṇila kr̥pīki | 10 |
ẏe putra goṭi hāde kāhāra ho droṇe
tapīpaṇa chāḍi kiṁpe dhaila dhanu troṇe | 11 |
aneka bāge ye pachārile kr̥pe
āsane basāile gaurobe samīpe | 12 |
snāhāna karāi bhojana dile triputi
āñchobana sāri āsane basāile mahāyati | 13 |
lg.note: aruṇa locanī go garuḍa khaga nāsā
biṇāḷa kaṭi go br̥ṣāḷa danta bhāsā |
snāna dāna pāna mā go atiẏa gahana
lg.l: aṇḍira kokiḷa yehne cūta ghana |

div.note: śaīra śakatā mā go bidyāre ādhipati
teṇu kari pitā nāma dile sarasvati |

lg.l: kr̥pa āchāryye pucchā kaleka droṇaṅku
ẏe śahasramāna he ke dilā tumbhaṅku | 14 |
sustha hoi kahanti harṣa bhāba hoi
mukatikaiṁ kāraṇa pāilu ẏe putrakai | 15 |
āho kr̥pāchāryye bipada āmbhakaiṁ paḍilā
ẏe putra prasabi hāde kr̥pī nāśa galā | 16 |
kr̥pe biṣāda hoile tāhā śuṇi
ati deśāntarī hoilu apramāṇi | 17 |
ẏetheṁ yebe karithānta gr̥habāsa
āmbha bhagnī kiṁpe huantā prāṇa nāśa | 18 |
kr̥pa āchāryyaṅkara bhariyā laghumaṇi
tāhā gocare aśastamākai samarpile āṇi | 19 |
ẏe putra goṭiki go pāḷasi yatane
āmbhar putra ho hāde ẏehāku na dekhibu bhinne | 20 |
ẏete śuṇi laghu putraku kākhe gheni
āśvaāsanā kari mukhe cumbana dile puṇi | 21 |
samasta śahasramāna gheniṇa droṇa mahākṣatrī
banaste paśi bidyā sādhanti niti prati | 22 |
praśurāmaṅkara śikṣāẏe caḷanti śasramāna
śaraghāra hoi paḍanti samasta jībamāna | 23 |
hariṇa bāhuṭiā gaṇḍā jība māri
kr̥pa āchāryya gharaku āṇḍi bhāra kari | 24 |
śibapura nagra kaiśika brāhmaṇa
tāhāra tahuṁ kanyā goṭiẏe pradāna hoile droṇa | 25 |
se kanyāra nāma ye aṭai daritā
se kumārī hoilā droṇaṅkara banitā | 26 |
phālagunya śukaḷapakṣa sauribāra ṣaṣṭhī
kr̥pa āchāryye rāile droṇa tapaniṣṭhi | 27 |
bāruṇābanta ākhaḍāku chāla āmbhe yibā
rājakumaramānaṅkara śara sādhana dekhibā | 28 |
kr̥pe droṇe gale hastinā ākhaḍāku
bhīṣme puanta khelāuchanti śahasra sūtra jāṇimāku | 29 |
droṇe kr̥pe duheṁ ubhā hoiṇa achanti
dekhile samaste śara sādhanā karanti | 30 |
kheḷe driyodhana lāṭa goṭiẏe māriṇa ye dilā
se lāṭa jīrṇṇa kūpare yāiṇa paḍilā | 31 |
bhīṣmaṅkara agrate kahile yāiṁ chāṭa
bāmpīra bhitare deba paḍilā yāi lāṭa | 32 |
sabhiẏe ruṇḍa hoile bāmpī kūpa beti
dekhile sātatāḷa gabhīre lāṭa acchi paḍi | 33 |
driyodhana boilā ẏehā kātibā kemante
paśita nuārilu gabhīra apramite | 34 |
droṇa boile ẏe sāmānya kūpa giṭi
ẏe chāra puṇa kisa dr̥ṣti bidyā seṭi | 35 |
driyodhana boilā tumbhe hoi kāhiṁra brāhmaṇa
dr̥ṣṭi bidyā boila yebe lāṭa dekhi āṇa | 36 |
kr̥pāchāryyaṅku boile bhāradvādaśaṅka tanaẏe
upāḍi āṇa ho guguciā lociẏe | 37 |

div.note: bhīṣme puaṅku kotha kheḷāuchanti saūtra jāṇibāku |
bhīṣme puaṅku phanda karāuchanti bidyā jāṇimāku |
phanda kheḷa dekhante dekha toṣa mati |
sīā kūpa gotike se yāiṇa paḍilā
ẏe chāra ki sāmānya dr̥ṣṭi bidya heṭi |
upaḍi āṇa ho guḷuciāra phaḷa lociẏe |
kotha–āmbaṭākuāre kheḷa :– (ṁarhathi ḍictionary,<lb/>Molesworth) kotha, koẏa ubhaẏa pāṭha acchi |

lg.l: kr̥pa āchāryye tāhā gheni aile bahana
guguciẏā śara goṭiẏe ghenileka droṇa | 38 |
mantra pati māile se kupara bhitare
guruciẏā śara yāi basilā lāṭara upare | 39 |
puṇa āreka goṭiẏe dile droṇa phiṅgi
se goṭi upare ẏe goṭi basilā yāi begi | 40 |
puṇa goṭie phiṅgi dile bhitare
ẏe goṭi basilā yāi se goṭi upare | 41 |
droṇaṅkara mantra mahiṁmā dekhanti sabong nr̥pa kumare
guguciā śara chāḍile sāta tāḷa kūpare | 42 |
droṇe ghenile yeuṁ upara śra goṭi
kūparu bāhāra ye hoi ailā lāṭa goṭi | 43 |
bhīṣmaṅka chāmure ye pakāile nei
samaste āśrija hoile tāhā chāhiṁ | 44 |
kāhākaiṁ gocara nāhiṁ na diśai bāṭa
guguciā nārāje se bāhāra hoilā lāṭa | 45 |
guruśreṣṭha hoila ho tumbhe dvijabara
ẏe ghānti jāṇibā dekhi bidyā ye tumbhara | 46 |
hastaru bacchā mudi pakāile kūpare driyodhana
ẏe ghānti bujhibā nā tohora mantra guṇa puṇa | 47 |
droṇe boile ẏe nohe asaṅkṣepa
samodra nadī nohai ẏe chāra mātra kūpa | 48 |
pratagyāṁ gāta dekhiṇa driyodhana haṭaṁ
hastuṁ droṇe āpaṇe ye kātile kuśabaṭu | 49 |
kuśabaṭu pakāile kūpara bhitare
mudi ābori basilā yāi chāri phere | 50 |

div.note: droṇe toḷile se upara phaḷa goṭi |

lg.l: āsa re boliṇa ḍāka dile droṇa guru
kuśabaṭu lāgi mudi bāhāra hoilā kūparu | 51 |
bhīṣmaṅka chāmure mudi pakāile nei
bhīṣme āśrija hoile tāhākaiṁ chāhiṁ | 52 |
bhīṣme boile śuśnasi ho brāhmaṇa
bhāradvādaśaṅka nandana aṭa ki tumbhe droṇa | 53 |
kr̥pa āchāryye boile ẏehi se droṇa aṭanti
praśurāmaṅka bidyā ẏe samasta jāṇanti | 54 |
bhīṣme boile droṇe daẏa kara ẏe puaṅku
bidyāguru hoi bidyā śikhāa ho ẏehāṅku | 55 |
aneka bāge boile kr̥pa ye āchāryye
tahuṁ bidyāguru hoile bhāradvādaśaṅkara ātmaje | 56 |
tuḷa māsa kr̥ṣṇa pakṣa cauṭhī gurubāra
rohiṇī nakṣatra ye br̥ṣa rāśi aṭai se dinara | 57 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa śiba nāme yoga
tuḷa saṅtrāntiki paciśa dina bhoga | 58 |
se dina bidyaku anakūḷa kale droṇa
gaṇanātha ākhaḍā caṇḍī pūjile tatakṣaṇa | 59 |
sakāḷa sandhyāẏe beni beḷa sādhanti ākhaḍa
madhyāhna beḷe pāṭha patanti sabong bīrā | 60 |
dhāuḍi ātraṣaṇa māla ye guḷuguñchi
paṭā konta bindhāṇa samasta guru sañchi | 61 |
bada śāhāsra mantre kaleka nirjita
ẏe mantreṇa ṇiṣa hoile nibiḍita | 62 |

div.note: paṭa konta bhāla bindhāṇa sabong sañchā |
ẏemanteṇa samasta bīrā cilā ye mārantā
samasta śāhāsra māna karanti mukha hastā |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba
driyodhana ẏeka uttara śate bhrātha aśastamā rādheba | 63 |
ẏemante āṭha uttara śate bhāi
praśurāmaṅkara bidyā droṇe samasta śikhāi | 64 |
lākhapaṭā ākāśa taḷe kale nei
samstaṅku adr̥śya hoibāra paiṁ | 65 |
paṭā jaḷā kale ẏekoiśa gaṭi
driyodhana bindhante jaḷā pākhe basaiṭi | 66 |
nohileṇa candra upareṇa basi
bhīmara bindhante jaḷā ānaṭhāre paśi | 67 |
dhuśāsana kehi nabindhe samara kari
droṇe se sātatāḷa bindhanti anusari | 68 |
karṇṇar hastare nei dileka ye dhanu
bāṅka candra dui bindhai radhebara tanu | 69 |
dekhiṇa haraṣa mana hele driyodhana
camatkāra paḍai paṇḍebaṅkara mana | 70 |
arjunara haste guru dile nei chāpa
bāṅka candraku gaḷāi bindha he pārthiba | 71 |
guruṅku namaskāra kari dhanure nārāja basāi
bāṅkarūḷi candre aṭhara dvāre śara yāi | 72 |
dekhiṇa camatkāra hoile driyodhana
guruṅkara tahuṁ tahoile adhika arjuna | 73 |
aśastamā haste dhanu pitā dile nei
ẏe candraku bāṇa bndhare bāḷa ye tanai | 74 |
kare nārāja dhari dhanure guṇa dilā
pitā nāma dhari bindhante pañchacandre nārāja caḷi galā | 75 |
dekhiṇa droṇa ye hoile cakita
bāsabi rādhebaku kehi nohile sāmartha | 76 |
tāla phari āḍaṇa pāṭaṇa ohāḍaṇa
karṇṇara tule samakacha hoiba arjuna | 77 |
driyodhanara tule bhīmasena
māla bidyāre pathare pakānti samāna | 78 |
nakuḷa dhuśāsana gheniṇa śābeḷī
śata bheḍā pariyante nakuḷa diẏe peli | 79 |
dhuśāsana diai pañchābana bheḍā
aśastamā diai pañchāśī pahaṇḍa chaḍa | 80 |
duiśata bheḍā ghuñchāi diai arjuna
śat bheḍā ghuñchāi diai bīra karṇṇa | 81 |
dekhiṇa driyodhana huai tātiṣṭha
sādhu sādhu dhanya re tu paṇḍu rājāra chāṭa | 82 |
māla biḍambaṇa sma bidyā siddha
dhanu sāẏaka bidyā smaste hele sādhya | 83–3654 |

div.head: {@jārā śabara upākhyāna@}

lg.l: agasti boile śuṇa baibasuta manu
jārā nāme jirāta ye ajapatira tanu | 1 |
gaṇḍā duigoṭā gheni ailā yatane
bāruṇābantakaiṁ caḷai toṣamane | 2 |
mathāre maḷura jhāli kaṇṭhe guñjarā maḷi
lohita barṇna netra śarīre raṅgadhūḷi | 3 |
dhamaṇā kāṭhara dhanu kaṇṭā bāẏeṁśara guṇa
ḍaḷi ābharaṇa phiriki nārāja troṇa | 4 |
ẏeheneka sarūpe ajapatira tanaẏe
droṇaṅku draśana kalā bāruṇābanta ākhaḍāẏe | 5 |
gaṇḍā dekhi ṣānanda hoile droṇa guru
muhiṁ bidyā putra hoiki āgyāṁ yebe karu | 6 |
yujheṣthi boilā ho thāu ẏe kirāta
banacara loka ẏehāre kāryya acchi bahuta | 7 |
śuṇiṇa kopa kalā se dhr̥tarāṣṭa baḷā
rāgeṇa boilā tu hīna kirāta re bahana ẏethuṁ paḷā | 8 |
arjuna boilā ẏe nohai ẏemanta
banacara loka ẏehāre achai kāryya bahuta | 9 |
gaṇḍā hariṇa ye mr̥ga bāhuṭiẏā
chāmerī ādi kari āṇuthiba jiāba sāḷehā | 10 |
thāu boli kari āgyāṁ dile guru droṇe
driyodhana boile kipāṁ bhaṇḍāa akāraṇe | 11 |
dhuśāsanaku boilā ẏehāku nia bāḷa dhari
banaste chāḍi āsa aneka abastā kar | 12 |
śuṇiṇa dhuśāsana keśa dhariṇa ye kope
yojanaka antare ye chāḍilā garu tāpe | 13 |
se jāra kirāta aneka trodha kalā
ākhaḍa śāḷaru āpaṇā palliki jhāḍa kāṭi nelā | 14 |
āpaṇā palli dvāre bhiāilā ākhaḍā
dvādaśa yojane thāi sādhai mahābīrā | 15 |
āpaṇā dvāre thāi bāruṇābanta ākhaḍāku laẏa dei
dvādaśa yojane thāi bidyā sādhai tahiṁ | 16 |
dekha ho mahimā pratāpī śabarī
dvādaśa yojane thāi taiẏe karai jārā | 17 |

div.note: ākhaḍā śāḷaru āpaṇā palliki ḷaṭā kaṭāilā |

lg.l: yebaṇa pāda gati karanti droṇa guru debe
sehi mati sādhanti sabong kaurobe | 18 |
sehi gatiki chāhiṁ śabara sādhai sabong bidyā
samasta śikhilā se kṣatriẏa mahāsiddhā | 19 |
tārā nāmeṇa ye tāhāra priẏabatī
se kirātaku boilā bimukha kari mati | 20 |
āmbhe banacara loka bana jība āhārī
mr̥gaẏā na yāi kiṁpā dhāiṁ dhāiṁ mari | 21 |
jārā boilā tu śuṇasire saṅghāta
kāḷe jāṇimu sinā ẏethira tadanta | 22 |
bhāriyā bilā ẏehaku kisa kisa boli
kebaṇa prakr̥ti tora ẏehā bujhi na pārili | 23 |
akāraṇe pāmara re kiṁpe dhaiṁ dhaiṁ maru
ẏehā ye sādhuachu ho ke tohora guru | 24 |
aṇa gurure bidyā ye nohai parāpata
mūrkha pāmara ho tu banacare jāta | 25 |
bhāriyāra bacana parama hita kalā
māṭira droṇeka se kirāta begeṇa thāpilā | 26 |
mathāre khañjilā se kr̥ṣṇa mr̥gara chāmara
guñjarā māḷīẏe khañjilāka lalāṭe tāhāra | 27 |
saṣṭika beni goṭi cakṣureṇa khañji
guñja garagaḍa māḷī gaḷāre acchi rañji | 28 |
koili sūtā paitā abharaṇa kalā bāma kandhe
kumuda māḷa utturī lambāilā chandhe | 29 |
candana kāṭha ghori hr̥dare dilā citā
dhāmaṇā kāṭhara dhanu dharāilā bāma hastā | 30 |

div.note: mr̥gaẏāku na yāu aśakandi hoi kimpā mari |

lg.l: ḍāhāṇa bhmajara ye tarjanī aṅguṣṭha
ākhaṛāśāḷaku tāhāra karāicchi dr̥sṭi | 31 |
se mr̥ttikā droṇara caraṇāmbuja sebi
sādhilā samasta bidyā kirātasena baiṣṭaṁbhī | 32 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa ho yugapati
ẏemante bidyā sādhilā caubiṁśa barṣa pariyanti | 33 |
pamasta bidyāre se hoilā nirjitā
dhanu bidyāre se hoilā baḷabantā | 34–3688 |

div.head: {@yudhiṣṭhirādiṅka astra parīkṣā@}

lg.l: basanta rutu se phālaguna māsa
bahuḷa pakṣa tr̥tīẏā śukaṅka dibasa | 1 |
hastā nakṣatra ye batiśa daṇḍa bhoga
bāṇijya nāme karaṇa śūḷa nāme yoga | 2 |
agnikoṇe yoginī nārāẏaṇī | mūrtti
sapatame candra ye pañchame br̥haspati | 3 |
ẏesaneka yoga anakūḷa bāti
bidyā parīlkṣa nimante śubha beḷā dhari | 4 |
ẏekā hoi guru paśile ghora bane
rātre bije kale kuṇḍaḷī nadī sannidhāne | 5 |
kośe pariyante nele bana kāṭi
kuṇḍaḷā nāme dekhile ẏeka pabongta goṭi | 6 |
se pabonga upare thilā kr̥ṣṇa agra br̥kṣe
nārāje adheka tāhā chedile pratakṣe | 7 |
se khamba upare basāile khaḍikā goṭiẏe
tahiṁra upare basāile śr̥ṅgadhāna goṭiẏe | 8 |
tahiṁra upare garagaḍa goṭiẏe ye thoi
garagaḍa upare soriṣa goṭiẏe basāi | 9 |
ẏesaneka upāẏe kale droṇe tahiṁ
rājaputra māne ẏehā na jāṇḍanti kehi | 10 |
bāhuḍi aile bhāradvādaśaṅka sute
kumaranta ghenigale bidyā parīkṣa nimante | 11 |
se nadīra tīre rahile bhāradvādaśaṅka tanu
karṇṇara hāthare guru dile prathameṇa dhanu | 12 |
boile nārāja pūroi niropani re karṇṇa
jisa kisai diśai re pabongtara sthāna | 13 |
karṇṇa chāhiṁlā ye nārāja pūrei
beni jānu kampilā ye tharahara hoi | 14 |
ātraṣaṇa kari ye chāhiṁlā bīra karṇṇa
guruṅkara mukha chāhiṁ bolai bacana | 15 |
pabongta goṭiẏe diśai guru dure
khamba goṭiẏe diśai tahiṁra upare | 16 |
tahiṁra upare khaḍikā diśai goṭiẏe
khaḍikāra pare diśe śr̥ṅgadhāna gotiẏe 17 |
śr̥ṅgadhāna upare guru he achai garagaḍa puṇa
āna kicchi hiṁ na diśai beni ye naẏana | 18 |
soriṣa na diśai boile guru droṇe
chāripāde bidyā ta nohilā sagpūrnṇa | 19 |
karṇṇa hastaru dhaile ajaṅga nāmā dhanu
aśastamā haste dile bhāradvādaśaṅkara tanu | 20 |
tu mohora nandanare kṣatriẏa putra goṭi
dhanure nārāja pūroi kara bābu dr̥ṣṭi | 21 |
kisa kisadr̥śya bābu re hoibāka tote
niropi kahani babu mohora agrate | 22 |
pitāra āgyāṁreṇa nārāja pūroiṇa śiṣi
ātreṣiṇa boilāka tāta pabongteka diśi | 23 |
tahiṁra upare hiśai khamba ye goṭiẏe
khambara upare diśai khadikā goṭiẏe | 24 |
antare garagaḍa goṭiẏe diśai ṭata
āna kiccha na diśai dahilā baḷabanta | 25 |
chāḍa dhanu boli dile yujheṣthiṅkara haste
dhanure nārāja pūroi niropanti kainte | 26 |
yetebeḷe dhanu ātreṣile yujheṣṭhi
ātraṣaṇa karante kampai beni muṣṭi | 27 |
banasta bhitare diśai pabongta goṭiẏe
pabongta upare diśai khamba ye goṭiẏe | 28 |
khambara upare acchi khaḍikā goṭiẏe
āna kicchi nadiśai kahili guru he | 29 |
chāḍa chāḍa dhanu boli boile bhāradvādaśaṅka tanaẏe
sagpūrṇṇa bidyā na diśai ẏete jaṇa ṭhāẏe | 30 |
driyodhana haste droṇe dileka nei dhanu
nārāja pūroi niropai dhr̥tarāṣṭa tanu | 31 |
dhanu ātreṣiṇa boilai dhr̥arāṣṭi
apāra dūre diśai dhabaḷa pabongta goṭi | 32 |
khamba goṭiẏeka diśai tahiṁra upare
khaḍikā goṭiẏe diśai kiñchita mātrakare | 33 |
āna tahiṁ kicchi na diśai śuṇimā guru he
droṇe boile kicchi hiṁ tu na pāilu sandehe | 34 |
driyodhana hastaru dhanu ye chaḍai
dhuśāsana haste ajaṅga dhanu dile nei | 35 |
dekha re dhuśāsana kisa kisa diśi
guruṅkara bacane nārāja pūroi ātreṣi | 36 |
banasta bhitare pabongteka diśai tāta
meghamaḷamāna diśai apramita | 37 |
chāḍa chāḍa boli dhuśāsana kuru dhanu gheni
bhīmasena hastare dileka guru droṇi | 38 |
nārāja pūroi niropa re bhīmasena
kisakisa diśai kaha sarūpa bacana | 39 |
kahai bhīmasena ẏe śukaḷa pabongta
khamba goṭiẏe diśai bidyamāna ākṣāta | 40 |
khaḍakā goṭiẏe diśai guru he
āna kicchi na diśai boile sandehe | 41 |
boile driyodhana gadā bidyā re paripūrṇṇa
samasta bhrāthamāne ẏehi rūpe puṇa | 42 |
chāḍa chāḍa boli hastaru dhanu gheni
sanidhyeṇa rāile kumāra phālaguni | 43 |
ajaṅga dhanu dile tāhāra ye haste
nārāja pūroi bābu kara dr̥ṣṭi pāte | 44 |
nārāja pūroi se niropai arajuna
guruṅkara agrate kahai phālagunya | 45 |
ātha sahara āṭha śata aṭhāiśi pahaṇḍe
pabongta upae diśai br̥kṣara arddha khaṇḍe | 46 |
tahiṁra upare diśai khaḍikā goṭiẏe
tahiṁra upare acchi śr̥ṅgadhāna goṭiẏe | 47 |
śr̥ṅgadhāna upare garagaḍa ye achai
tahiṁra upare soriṣa goṭiẏe diśai | 48 |
khambaku binddhabi ki khaḍikāku binddhabi
kaha guru he śr̥ṅgadhānaku nārāja sanddhabi | 49 |
garagaḍaku binddhabi ki soriṣaku binddhabi sandehe
kāhāku binddhabi mote āgyāṁ hou guru he | 50 |
droṇe boile bābu chāḍa chāḍa dhanu
tu se bharābhara uśvāsibu ẏe madhya bhmabanuṁ | 51 |
arjuna pūroi acchi dibya śara
dekhi achanti beti sabong rājakumara | 52 |
arjuna boilā guru he pūroili śara
na binddhale doṣa ẏetheṁ achai apāra | 53 |
droṇe boile bābu tu dr̥ta karasi muṣṭi
niścaḷa hoi khamba khaḍikā dhāna aragaḍa goṭi | 54 |
samaste tahiṁre ye hoithibe niścaḷa
tahiṁ upare soriṣa goṭiẏe hoiba beniphāḷa | 55 |
ẏeheneka svarūpa nārāja bindha bābu
binddhale jagajitā tuhi re hoibu | 56 |
droṇaṅkara bacane sānanda phālaguni
hr̥dagate laẏe kalā abalokana śasra gheni | 57 |
kiñchita prātrame se binddhalā sūtra śara
antarīkṣe paḍilā se soriṣa upara | 58 |
bidyāra sarūpa dekha he mahīpāḷa
nārāja paḍi soriṣa hoilā beni phāḷa | 59 |

div.note: “bidyāra sarūpa dekha he mahīpāḷa” sthānara adhikā pāṭha–
bidyā parikṣa hāde dekha ho mahīpāḷe
khamba khaḍikā garagaḍa dhana achai niścaḷe |

lg.l: khamba khaḍikā dhāna garagaḍa na ṭaḷilā
duiphāḷa hoi soriṣa sehi garagaḍare rahilā | 60 |
pratakṣe bidyā dekhile droṇa guru
sadhu sādhu dhuni goṭiẏe śubhilā ākāśaru | 61 |
dekhi parama sānanda bhāradvādaśaṅka śiṣi
babu praśurāmaṅkara bidyā tohora tahiṁ acchi | 62 |
ẏete bichāri se ruṣikuḷa baccha
tuhi se bhārā bābu nibāribu prataccha | 63 |
ābara ẏemānaṅkare kisa praẏojana
bāhuḍi śiṣyanta gheni aile bāruṇābanta bhmabana | 64–3752 |

div.head: {@droṇaṅku kumbhīra mukharu arjunaṅka rakṣā@}

lg.l: bāhuḍile droṇa śiṣyagaṇanta samete
gaṅgākai gale āharṇṇika nimante | 1 |
arjuna rāi āgyāṁ abadhāri
tu se yāani bābu āmbhara nija purī | 2 |
tiḷa khaṇḍiẏe āṇa bābu mathāre lagāibāku
se tiḷa taḷe na thoibu bābu mohora śapata tuku | 3 |
guru āgyāṁ śire nibeśi arjuna caḷi yāi
gupate driyodhanaku paśakai rāi | 4 |
manabhedī bidyā ye kahile guru droṇe
nārāja pūroi driyodhana hoilā ṭhāṇamāṇe | 5 |
mantra sumari binddhalā sūtre śara
nārāja na kṣepilā yāi patraṅka upara | 6 |
chāḍa chāḍa boli guru āpaṇe dhanu dhari
mantra ābāhane nārāja sandhāna kari | 7 |
se nārāja yāi padilā patraṅka upare
dekhi rahi patramāne paḍile bhūmire | 8 |
tahuṁṇa droṇe ye bege caḷi gale
śiṣyamānanta gheni nadī kūḷare rahile | 9 |
arjuna gala ye guruṅka mandire
tiḷa khori gheni se āsei bege khare | 10 |
dekhilā baṭabr̥kṣa se patre nāhiṁ kicchi
hr̥dagate bichāri jāṇilā sabongsācī | 11 |
ẏethira nimante guru peṣileka muku
gupate mantra ẏehā kahile driyodhanaku | 12 |
hr̥dagate bisarilā bīra phālagani
pañcha nārāja binddhalā mahāmantra gheni | 13 |
tiḷa khori goṭi thoilā se nārāja upare
guruṅkara bacana ye nibeśita śire | 14 |
dhanure śastra dei ṭhiā ṭhāṇi hoilā
nārājamāna peṣi se beṇṭamāna cchināilā | 15 |
tahuṁ tiḷa khāri gheni gamai ati bege
prabeśa hoilā yāi guruṅkara āge | 16 |
dekhiṇa santoṣa hoile tapobante
se tiḷa guru lagāile nija māthe | 17 |
gaṅgājaḷe guru paśile abagāhi
jaḷaprabhā thilā se dhailā niṭhāi | 18 |
yadyapi āpaṇe tabināśi pārai
śiṣyanta hāka dile ati ākuḷa hoi | 19 |
samaste paḷāi yāi kūḷare uṭhile
arjuna rahilā ẏekā guruṅkara tule | 20 |
dhanureṇa nārāja se pūroi chāḍilā
prāṇa bisarjiṇa jaḷaprabhā hiṁ paḍilā | 21 |
droṇaṅkara aṅge nohilāka āghāta
kumbhīra mātraka se hoilāka hāta | 22–3774 |

div.head: {@droṇaṅkara arjunaku brahmaśirā śara pradāna@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho rājana santoṣa hoi guru kūḷe yāi uṭhi
brahmaśirā śara dileka kiraṭī | 1 |
sāmānyakai peṣile apaṇā prāṇa nāśa yāi
mahātmā jana hoile se niścaẏe naśai | 2 |
tahuṁṇa gamana kari āsanti guru śiṣye
sehi baṭabr̥kṣa taḷe hoile prabeśe | 3 |
dekhile śākhā hoiacchi muṇḍita
hr̥dagate bichāri jāṇile ruṣasuta | 4 |
arjunakaiṁ hakāri boile bacana
āmbhara bacana tu laṅghilu bidyamāna | 5 |
karapatra yoḍi se boilā arajuna
tumbhara bacana mote śirāgrata jāṇa | 6 |
bhūmigate muṁ ye na thoili tiḷa khori
pañcha nārāja binddha kuruḷi thoili tiḷi khori
pañcha nārāja binddha kuruḷi thoili gagana chari | 7 |
śuṇina guru ye hoile santoṣa
mana chedana mantra kahile upadeśa | 8 |
mukhe cumbana dei śarīra āuṁśi
tahuṁ āsi nija mandireṇa paśi | 9 |
lg.note: mahā śatr̥ku se ye ẏe śara bindhai |
tumbhara bacana meṇṭa baku muṁ nohai bhājana |
lg.l: śiṣyamāne gale ye yāhā nija bāsa
gr̥hakarme yāi guru hoile parabeśa | 10–3784 |
lg.head: {@kairaba pāṇḍabādiṅkara astraparīkṣā@}
lg.l: agastiṅki pachārile baibasuta manu
ẏethi uttāru kebaṇa kr̥ta kale bhāradvādaśaṅka tanu | 1 |
puṇa keteheṁka dina bahi yāānte
hr̥dagate bichāra kale śraẏa debī sute | 2 |
gupata parīkṣa āmbhe karāilu nirute
ẏebe bidyā parīkṣa karibā dekhantu samaste | 3 |
tahuṁ śiṣyanta gheni guru bege caḷi gale
rājāra siṁghadvāre yāiṇa prabeśa hoile | 4 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa kr̥pa āchāryya ye somadatta
bālahika bidura achanti samasta | 5 |
bhīṣmakai droṇe boile puṇa bākyanta
śasra śāsrata pāile putre bahuta | 6 |
āmbhara bidyā tumbhara dekhibāra ucita
śuṇiṇa sanamata kaleka bahuta | 7 |
bhīṣme boile ye biduraṅku chāhiṁ
droṇe boile bidyā parīkṣa pāiṁ | 8 |
sabhā sambhara ho kara tumbhe yāi
dāṇḍe ghoṣaṇa diāa chāragaṇa rāi | 9 |
śuṇiṇa takṣaṇe bidura caḷi gale
nagre ghoṣaṇa diāi samasta ruṇḍa kale | 10 |
subarṇṇara kaḷasa khañjale dibya ratna
mukutāra toṇa lambita bicitra bitapana | 11 |
bicitra sabhāẏeka kale bidyamāna
miḷike sabhāẏe ye kṣatri baśya bipra jana | 12 |
nagra nara nārī miḷile samsta
kumāramāne miḷile kare asra śasra | 13 |
nānā bādya bajāile kale śaṅkhadhuni
pūtra dekhāile ye yāhāra śasra gheni | 14 |
dekhi sabhājane hoile camatkāra
ẏekaku āreka ye teja mahā parakhara | 15 |
bodira lajamte jāde dhr̥tarāṣṭa jāṇi
jaṇe jaṇe prati santoṣa bakhāṇi | 16 |
nāna śasra bidyā dekhāile sabong
sādhu sādhu arjuna boli nagre śubhilā ẏeka rāba | 17 |
bhāma driyodhana melanti gadāyuddha
aśastamā yāiṁ kale madhyeṇa birodha | 18 |
arjuna dhanu ātreṣi kalā agni śara
prajvaḷita bahani uṭhilā brahmāṇḍara | 19 |
puṇa bāruṇā śara kalāka sabongsācī
pabanā śasa ghāẏe prakhara bahuacchi | 20 |
pabanāsra meghāsra bijaẏāsra māḷā
meghā śase pabongta srijai indra baḷā | 21 |
antardhyāẏe hoi caḷai śasraghāta
kṣaṇe ratha kṣaṇe gaja kṣaṇe aśvagata | 22 |
kṣaṇe turaṅga gata kṣaṇe bhumigata
luhā śareka puṇa binddhalā ara ghāta | 23 |
lg.note: śahasra dekhānti ye yāhāra eja gheni |
lg.l: sabhāra samaste karanti dhani dhani
sādhu sādhu śasra bindhai phālaguni | 24 |
driyodhana boilā aśastamāku rāi
samasta bidya ta acchi tohora tahiṁ | 25 |
śate bhāi gheni hoile puṇa kati
datya bināśane yesaneke paśupati | 26 |
tadantare puṇa karṇṇa hoilāka āsi
bāḷaarka jāṇi śarīra jyoti diśi | 27 |
yeteka śara dekhāilā rīra pātha
tula śahasra kalā se rādhebara suta | 28 |
driyodhana dekhi yāiṁ kalā koḷāgrata
ājhuṁṇa sakhā mote hoilu bho maitra | 29 |
aṅga deśa rājya tu bhmañjabu bipuḷa
karṇṇa boilā tu ho śuṇa mahīpāḷa | 30 |
arjuna tule karāa mote yuddha
muṁ tāhāku jiṇi pārai raṇa madhya | 31 |
kr̥pa āchāryye boile arjuna rājāra kumara
sārathira tanaẏe hoi ẏeḍeka gabong tohora | 31 |
tohora mātā pitākai kara yā anumata
pacheṇa yuddha kara arjuna saṅgata | 33 |
lg.note: śate bhāi puṇa hoile yāi kati
lg.l: śuṇi kari karṇṇa ye hoilā nyūnapakṣa
driyodhana tāhākai āborilā kacha | 34 |
śūrabanta jana ki huanti akuḷīna ?
arjuna sariki karṇṇa hoicchi ghaṭaṇa | 35 |
bhīmasena boilā sārathira suta
ratha se bāhiba yuddha nohai yugata | 36 |
ẏethu anantare āsthāna mauḷi
ye yāhā sthānakai gale sabonge caḷi | 37 |
droṇa guru caḷile āpaṇā bhmabane
aneka deśa ghoṣa pāile ratna yāne | 38 |
śuṇa ho rājana puṇa hiṁ karanti bidyā upāsana
miḷiṇa dekhanti nagra janamāna | 39 |
nārāja bindhanti se lākheka ubhāri
ye yāhara baḷa dhanu haste dhari | 40 |
dhanu dhari nārāja bindhante aśastamāra kampai bhmaja
karṇṇara jānu kampai niruna hoẏe teja | 41 |
driyodhana śira kampai dhanure nārāja binddhale
dhuśāsana bukusthaḷa kampai dhanu ātreṣile | 42 |
nārāja pūroile kumara yujheṣṭhi
pabana gati prāẏe kampai agguṣṭhi | 43 |
bhīṣmaṅkara kampai śira droṇaṅkara kampai bhmaja
nikampa arjana se bāsebara ātmaja | 44 |
tadanta kariṇa bujhiluni sabong tatu
ẏehāṅkar hastare hoiba sabuṅkari mr̥tu | 45 |
lg.note: aneka deśa ghoṣa pāile hāde dāne |
śuṇa ho rājana puṇa karānti bidyā upadeśamāna |
lg.l: ẏekānta kariṇa rāile droṇe āpaṇāra baḷā
ẏethi thile nandana re maribu, bahana hoi paḷā | 46 |
yebaṇa nārāja goṭi bābu re bindhai phālaguni
se nārāja mune diśai grahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa tini | 47 |
ẏeheneka kari ẏehāku srijilā bidhātā
trailokye brahmāṇḍe ẏehāku nāhiṁ nā jiṇantā | 48 |
abaśya driyodhana na chāḍiba tote
tu puṇa badha hoi ṭi arjunara haste | 49 |
puṇi hiṁ bidyāmāna ye karanti ārambha
bāghamuhiṁ chandā ye pātile dvāre dambha | 50 |
pañchiśa sahasra piṭaṇā mururare lagāi
kāṭha jaḷā bhitare oṭāranti sabonge bīre yāiṁ | 51 |
prathame driyodhana oṭārai sāta sahasra baḷa
dhuśāsana oṭārai pāñcha sahasra baḷa | 52 |
kr̥pe chāri sahasra bhīṣme pañchaśata tiriśa sahasra baḷa
droṇe oṭārile chaḷiśa sahasra paritāḷa | 53 |
yujheṣṭhi deba oṭāranti tiriśi sahasra garu
pañchāśa sahasra uṭāranti brikodara bhaẏāṅkāru | 54 |
karṇṇa oṭāranti nau sahasra bhara
aśastamā oṭāranti aṭhostari sahasa paritāḷa bhāra | 55 |
sahadeba chāri sahasra nakuḷa pañchatiriśa baḷa
driyodhanara aneśvata bhrātha ẏehi rūpe paritāḷa | 56 |
arjune oṭāranti sahasre lakṣe bhāra
dekhi camatkāra hoile droṇe samaste kurubīra | 57 |
droṇe aśastamaku ḍākile sannidhyara
jībana nimante bābu ye dhūrjaṭia sebā kara | 58 |
puṇyatoẏo nadīkūḷe sarasvatī kūḷe
nirañjana sumara bābu ude baṭa aḷe | 59 |
lg.note: nirañjana sumara bābu uddāḷaka baṭa mūḷe |
lg.l: yebe hastināku yibāku karu icchā
amara bara tu bābu kara mana bāñcchā | 60 |
droṇaṅkara bacane ye caḷai aśastamā
tuleṇa mātuḷa se caḷai kr̥pa brahmā | 61 |
puṇyatoẏā nadī tīre rañchile āśrame
ajapā laẏe kari ye cintile deba brahme | 62 |
sarasvatī ye snāhāna kari yānti anubrate
āhāra tejyā kale pañchadaśa baraṣa pariyante | 63–3847 |
lg.head: {@gāndhārī o kuntīṅkara bibāda@}
lg.l: badaẏanti baibasuta munu śuṇimā agasti he
kathāẏe pachābi baḍāi sandehe | 1 |
bidyā parīkṣa kathā śuśniḷi muhiṁ bhale
ẏethuṁ utāreṇa puṇa kebaṇa kr̥tya kale | 2 |
kointā gāndhārīra bibāda bāratā
badaẏanti agasti śuna manu mahārathā | 3 |
bsanta rutu ye phālaguna māsa
kr̥ṣṇapakṣa sapatamī āditya dibasa | 4 |
gāndhārī kointa ehu beni yāẏe
yamunā nadīki se prātasnāna kari gaẏe | 5 |
lg.note: “kr̥pa brahmā” pada pare goṭie pothire adhikā pāṭha–
lg.l: subarṇṇara hāndoḷāre bijaẏe gāndhārī
tuleṇa achanti aneka dāsī paribārī | 6 |
agara candana ye karpūra kastūrī
kuśa agra guguḷa naibedya ādi kari | 7 |
ālaṭa chāmara ye gheniṇa yubatī
biśvanātha bhagati nimante yamunā kūḷakaiṁ caḷiṇa yāānti | 8 |
kointāẏe debī yāānti ẏekāṅge
puṣpa naibedya gheni caḷanti se bege | 9 |
yamunā jaḷe paśi nitya karma sāri
atneśvara prāsāde paśile gāndhārī | 10 |
hāndoḷāru ohlāi gāndhārasena dohitī
biśvanātha draśane gamai rādheba kanyā acchi kati | 11 |
ẏemanta samaẏe kontabhojara dulāḷī
deuḷe prabeśa kare gheni arghyasthāḷī | 12 |
rādhebī jaṇāilā ye gāndhārīṅkara agrate
kontāẏe bije kale tumbhara saṅgate | 13 |
gāndharī boile kointādebī chāhiṁ
ki nimane prāsādaku ailusi tuhi | 14 |
yābata kāḷe ẏe liṅga aṭai mohora
tu kimpā pūjibu hīna jībana tohora | 15 |
yebaṇa nārī aṭanti bhrathā ye biyogī
samasta kāryyaku se aṭai alāgī | 16 |
srastāpa bākyeṇa aneka bolā boli
hāboḍā hāboḍi hoiṇa hoile pelā peli | 17 |
beni kuḷa aprīti dekhiṇa biśvanātha
dui yāāṅkara se miḷile agrata | 18 |
badaẏanti śaśidhara mara kisa pāiṁ
āmbhe debatāẏe kāhāra nohuṁ āī | 19 |
yahiṁ bhoga pāiṁ tahiṁ āmbhe thāiṁ
akāraṇa kathāre tumbhara kaḷi kisa paiṁ | 20 |
prabhāte subarṇṇa śate campāgheni āge ye pūjai
āmbhe tāhāra hoilu boile debarājai | 21 |
na pūji beni yāẏe nabare prabeśa
kointāẏe boile mu karibaiṁ kisa | 22 |
śateka putra tāhāra puṣpe puṣpe māgante
śateka puṣpa ta hoibāka yugate | 23 |
sabonge mohora pañchagoṭi tanaẏe
pañchāṇoi goṭi kāhuṁ hoiba upāẏe | 24 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā jabāṭa kiḷi śutile kontāẏe
ẏemantara samaẏe miḷilā dhanurjaẏe | 25 |
mātākai anna māgilā pātha yāiṁ
uṭhiṇa kointāẏe boile arjunaku chāhiṁ | 26 |
āja bābu gali muṁ mahādeba draśane
gāndhārī aneka jhiṁghāsilā śuṇa phālagunye | 27 |
boilā āmbhara debatā ẏe aṭai kāḷe kāḷe
tu kimpā pamerī paśilu deuḷe | 28 |
ẏeteka bacane muṁ pāili apamāna
duhigkari agrate ubhā hoile trilocana | 29 |
tumbhe kandaḷa go nakara beni yāmbhe
āmbhara mukharu tumbhe śuṇasi kathāẏe | 30 |
ājñā dile deba bacana nirādhāri
subarṇṇa śate campā gheni ye pūjai āmbhe hoibu tāhāri | 31 |
tāhara śate putra se śate campā pāiba
mora pañcha putra se pāñcha puṣpa hiṁ hoiba | 32 |
pañchāṇoi puṣpa kāhuṁ āṇibi muhiṁ
ẏe kathā mane guṇi kabāṭa binddha laiṁ | 33 |
lg.note: ẏe kathā mane guṇi kabāṭa kiḷilaiṁ |
lg.l: yāhā se dhātā kalāka likhita
bhrathā biyoge muṁ hoili amahata | 34 |
ẏete boliṇa se bhojarājāra duhitā
ucce rodana kale manaere mahācintā | 35 |
arjuna boile mātā cintā na kara
subarṇṇa puṣpa sinā, bhrānti mane na dhara | 36 |
kanaka śate pāte pākhuḍā hoithiba śate daḷa
subarṇṇe subarṇṇe kāli pūroibi deuḷa | 37 |
arjuna bacane begi uṭhi kontī māta
subarṇṇara pailame dile dadhi anna ghr̥ta | 38 |
ye yāhāra ucchāẏe snāhāna bhojana sāri
sukhe pañchabīre nidrā apahari | 39 |
ẏethu anantare raẏeṇī prabhīte
bimaḷa suśītaḷa bahai marute | 40 |
prāsādamānaṅkare śaṅkha dhuni phūri
nidrā teji uṭhile bhojarājāra kumārī | 41 |
putrakai toḷi debī bacana sambhāṣi
śuṇiṇa arjuna uṭhiṇa bege āsi | 42 |
subarṇṇa ra pātre debī yogāḍanta lāi
mātā putra caḷi gale se liṅga ṭhābakai | 43 |
yamunā jaḷe paśi kaleka snāhāna
tarpaṇa sāri prāsāda bhitare paśile beni jana | 44 |
agara karpūra kastūrī lepana hāde kari
campā nāgeśvara bakuḷa śireṇa ubhāri | 45 |
bahuta bidhi ye śītaḷa drabyamāna
agrae thoi debī hoile kārpuṇya | 46 |
karapatra yoḍi stuti kaleka apāra
jaẏa tu umāpati deba tu se candraśekhara | 47 |
jaẏa tu biśveśvara kapāḷadhara pāṇi
sura siddha muni yāhāra caraṇe pariṇāmi | 48 |
ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra baraṣa samara ghora yuddha
gaṇanātha prasanne tripura kalu badha | 49 |
tripurāri boli tote saṅsareṇa bhāṣi
mama kaṣṭa uddhāraṇa kara deba kāśī | 50 |
bhrathāra biyoge muhiṁ aṭai anāstuṇī
taba padu pāde mora śateka daini | 51 |
jaẏa jaẏa pābongtīra prānātha deba hara
muhiṁ nirimākhī mote kara pratikāra | 52 |
śrī biśvanātha pādapadme mohora mātha
badaẏanti sāroḷā dāsa muṁ janme janme tohora bhr̥tya | 53 |
lg.note: jaẏa tu umā debī ballabha candra śekhara |
andheka bināśa tri pura gabong gañjā
mana kaṣṭa saṅkaṭuṁ uddhara deba kāśī |
taba pada paṅkaje mora śatebāra daẏini |
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu pābongī prāṇanātha deba hara
muṁ hīna nirmālkṣī mote pratikāra kara |
śrī śrī biśveśvara pāda paṅkaje mora āśa
badanti sāroḷā dasa janme janme abhyāsa |
lg.l: pāda arghya nei se manu mahārājā
agastiṅka caraṇe se kalā dibya pūjā | 54 |
bho deba arjuna galā subarṇṇeśvara liṅga tahiṁ
kisa kāraṇa ye puṇa tahiṁ hoilaiṁ | 55 |
śuṇa ho rājana pātha bābala śareka peṣilā parcaṇḍa
aẏeṁḷā śira cchiḍi hoilā beni khaṇḍa | 56 |
puṇa bābaleka binddhala dr̥ta muṣṭi
jaḷadhara bāṇa puṇa binddhalāka bīra
padma baraṣilā pāṇira saṅgara | 58 |
aẏeṁḷā śirabuḍi subarṇṇa kuta kuta hoi paḍi
śate śate pākhuḍā aṣṭa ratne jaḍī | 59 |
śuṇa ho rājā gāndhārī galā ye bahuta pratjñā kari
lg.note: putranta basi pachārai kara ye prāsāri | 60 |
lg.l: yamunā kūḷe achanti liṅgara subarṇṇe
bābu mānagobinda tu śuṇa sābadhāne | 61 |
se liṅga draśane gali kāli muhiṁ
kointāẏe gale se liṅgakai dāhi | 62 |
tāhāra mohora ye hoilā uccabāca
muhiṁ boili tohora ẏe kebaṇa parapañcha | 63 |
kāḷe kāḷe ẏe liṅga aṭai mohora
tu kiṁpā āsi ẏehi liṅgara katira | 64 |
liṅgara madhyuṁ deba bije kari āsi | 65 |
āmbha duhiṅkara agrate ubhā hoi
paramārtha bacana kahile umāsaāiṁ | 66 |
kāli prabhāte śateka subarṇṇa campā gheni
ẏe pūjā kariba kāli pāhile rajanī | 67 |
āmbhe tāhāra se hoibu niẏate
ẏesaneka bacana se boile biśvanāthe | 68 |
tumbhe mohora ye aṭa śata putra
ẏethakai mote karaṇa kariba niẏata | 69 |
śuṇi mānagobinda parama sānanda
śate bhrātha tahuṁ se śate campā dhari ānanda | 70 |
rajanī prabhāte caḷai gāndhārī
subarṇṇaśvara deuḷe bije yāiṁ kari | 71 |
śate paribārī achanti tāra tule
yamunā tīrare debī bijaẏe yaiṁ kale | 72 |
snāna sāri aile debatā draśana pāiṁ
dekhilā subarṇṇa puṣpa paḍicchi kuta kuta hoi | 73 |
dekhi se birasa ye hoilā gāndhārī
deba āḷa dekhi se bāhuḍai khara kari | 74 |
bāhuḍiṇa nagare se paśai turita
maneṇa birasa sarasa nāhiṁ citta | 75 |
gāndhārī praśaṁsai dhanya kontā debī
dhanya lakṣaṇe putra jāta kalu dhanya tu sādhabī | 76 |
dhanya dhanya tohora putra phālaguni
ẏesaneka praśaṁsā kalāka kāminī | 77 |
ẏemanta bichāri se gāndhārasenara duhita
manare bitriẏā dhari se hoilā cakita | 78 |
ẏethu anantare śuṇa dibya rasa
yāhā se kahile kumbha ruṣira śiṣa 79 |
debatāmāne kaleka bahuta stuti
jaẏa tu parthiba tu toṣilu debī kontī | 80 |
sura pure śubhilā jaẏe jaẏe
debatāẏe nāma dile ye dhanañjaẏe | 81 |
dhanare toṣi dhanarjaẏe nāma pāilā
śuṇa baibasuta manu agasti kahilā | 82 |
padmanidhi kāṭilā ye arjuna chāpahasta
bāhuḍi se nidhi hoila kemanta | 83 |
ẏethira carita mote kaha tapobanta
agasti kahile śuṇa ho mantu mahata | 84 |
debatāmāne stuti kale arjunaku
yebaṇa subarṇṇa dilu subarṇṇa liṅgaku | 85 |
bāhuḍāi ratnamāna thoa dhanurdhara
kubera bhmabana ye na kara nārakhāra | 86 |
debatāṅka bcane bhūmiru nārāja binddhalā
bāhuḍāi ratnanidhi kubera bhaṇḍāre thoilā | 87 |
padmakaiṁ ye aṭai yebaṇa nidhi
mahākalpa koṣa se aṭai prasiddhi | 88 |
ahomukhī nārāja pabanaru jāta
se nidhira sthaḷī hoilā jaḍita | 89 |
bāhuḍi saṅgharilā padmanidhira bhitare
arjunara mahimā tu śuṇilu nr̥pabare | 90 |
śuṇi parama sānanda manu mahāgyāṁtā
debaku durlabha se arjunara kathā | 91–3938 |

div.head: {@ekalabya upākhyāna@}

lg.l: ẏethu anantare droṇe śiṣya mānanta hakāri
bābu tumbhe yāasi mr̥gaẏā binoda kari | 1 |

div.note: ethu anantare droṇe śiṣya putranta hakāri
bābu tumbhe yāasi mr̥gaẏā bana heri |

lg.l: aśastamāku prasabi kr̥pī nāśa galā
tāhāra prāṇa tyāja dibasa prabeśa hoilā | 2 |
gaṇḍā goṭiẏe bābu māri āṇa yāi banuṁ
guruṅkara bacane caḷanti sabong tanu | 3 |
paścime bhīma arjuna dakṣiṇe bīra karṇṇa
śate sodara gheni uttaraku caḷai driyodhana | 4 |
bhramanti kumāre khedanti mr̥gāri
kṣidre na chāḍanti ye gaṇḍā jība loḍi | 5 |
dakṣiṇe karṇṇa loḍi na pāilā gaṇḍā jība
mr̥ga bhāreka gheni draśana kalā guruṅku rādheba | 6 |
paścima kośaḷe gale bhīmasena arajuna
gaṇḍā dui goṭā gheni guruṅku draśana kaleka pañchudina | 7 |
uttaraku gale ye driyodhana śate bhrātha
khedanti bana gahane ye aneka pabongta | 8 |
loḍanti gahana aṭabya puṇya gaṇḍā
khedanti banastare bihaḍanti durddaṇḍā | 9 |
maṇināga boli ẏekai pabongta goṭiẏe
tahiṁra taḷe acchi jaḷaghāṭa goṭāẏe | 10 |
se pāṇi ghāṭa jagi achanti anusari
tahiṁki nikaṭa jārā beṇṭakāra purī | 11 |
se jārā śabara bhāriyā śiriẏā nāme bāḷī
svāmīki boilā dr̥ṣṭi deithāa ye pallī | 12 |
snāna kari muṁ āṇaiṁ jaḷa ghaṭi goṭiẏe
dvāraku talaẏe karithāa mora āsibāra yāẏe | 13 |
svāmīki sambhodhi caḷai śabara taruṇī
sarobare paśi ghaṭe pūroilā pāṇi | 14 |

div.note: mane mane anusari gaṇḍā jība loḍi |
khedanti gahana bana aṭabyā se paśi gaṇḍā |
tahiṁra nikaṭa ye kirāta benu purī |

lg.l: ghaṭa tīre thoi sārilā snāhāna
kūḷe āsi kalā patra pariharaṇa | 15 |
mathare basāilā pāṇighaṭa goṭi
siṁgha ṭhāṇi jāṇi se āsai leuṭi | 16 |
dūre thai dekhilā tāku dhuśāsana mūte
ātreṣi beni bhmaje tāku dhailāka gāte | 17 |
dekhi se śiriẏā ye chāhaṁi leuṭi
tribhmabane sundara bāḷuta ẏe kāhāra putra goṭi | 18 |
śabaraṇī dekhante se dhāiṁle sabong duṣṭe
betiṇa śabaraṇīki hari loḍile pāpiṣṭhe | 19 |
bho nātha rakha boli ucce dilā ḍāke
bho svāmī baḷātkāra karanti kāhāra duṣṭa loke | 20 |
uccasvare yahuṁ śubhilā bhāriyā rodana bāṇī
ākhaḍāre thāi tāhā jārā śabara śuṇi | 21 |
hastare dhanuśara gheni bāhāra kirāta
dhāiṁṇa prabeśa hoilā yāiṁ kurubīraṅka saṅgata | 22 |
mahā bikaṭāḷa svarūpa se bhairoba mūrati
hāka diai kirāta re tumbhe kāhāra ho kati | 23 |
śuṇiṇa pracaṇḍa mūrati dhuśāsana mahābīrā
pratagyāṁ kari boilā maribu re śabarā | 24 |
banacara loka hoi kimpā tohora ẏemanta gharaṇī
rājāṅkara abiṣekaku ẏe yogāi pāṭarāṇī | 25 |
āmbhe somabongśī pr̥thīki ādhipata
ẏehāra nimante tu re hoibu prāṇe kṣati | 26 |
durbhāra bacana śuṇi se jārā beṇṭakāra
dhanure basāilā ātreṣiṇa śara | 27 |

div.note: mahā bikaṭāḷa ṭhāṇi se bhairoba mūrati |
ẏehāra nimante tu re hoibu prāṇe binaśyati |

lg.l: bhumiki goṭiẏe binddhalā guruṅka nāma dhari
mathare mr̥ttikā ghenilā droṇa guruṅku sumari | 28 |
ẏeka uttara śare ye aṭanti kurubīre
jaṇe jaṇeke pūroilā śate śate śare | 29 |
abikṣaṇe bāṇa yahuṁ binddhalā mahāmantre
jaṇeke śate śate śara padilā hr̥dagate | 30 |
tripaṇḍa gaḷita ye śaīre astra bhedi
paḍile kurubīre rudhira bahai nadī | 31 |
bhāriyāku gheniṇa caḷai bīra jārā
āpaṇā pallīre prabeśa śabarā | 32 |
droṇe bāṭa chāhānti driyodhana tanailā
patha niropante dvādaśa dibasa hoilā | 33 |
saṅgare ghenile guru karṇṇa bhīma kibīṭī
bāṭa anusari hāde āsanti pāchoṭi | 34 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ sarobara kūḷa
dekhile paḍichanti kurubīra sakaḷa | 35 |
yesaneka br̥kṣe loṭanti mahābāta kāḷe
tesane diśanti ye kurubīra sakaḷe | 36 |
hr̥de nārāja paḍi piṭhi katiki phuṭi
mahā prtāpa bīre bhūmire chanti loṭi | 37 |
bhīmasena dhāiṁ yāiṁ dekhilāka dūru
samaste śaraghāte paḍichanti he guru | 38 |
bhāradvādaśaṅkara nandana dekhiṇa bichārile
ẏe ta āmbhara bidyā boli arjunaku pachārile | 39 |
dekhani ẏe banastare ke achai phālaguni
praśurāmaṅkara bidyā ke āna achai gheni | 40 |

div.note: jaṇeke śata, śata bāṇa paḍilā nirghāte |

lg.l: ānaku gocara nohai ẏe bidyā
mānabe gocara kahiṁ ẏeteka prasiddhā | 41 |
guruṅkara bacane loḍai sabongsacī
dekhilā gahana bane śabara pallī ẏeka acchi | 42 |
kirāta ākhaḍāre paṭāẏe bindhai bāṇa
arjunaku dekhi bāhāra tatakṣaṇa | 43 |
haste dhāmaṇā kāṭhara dhanu kaṇṭā bāẏeṁśara guṇa
kaṭi mekhaḷe koṭhāra phiriki nārāja troṇa | 44 |
gada gada bākye kisa kisa boli
arjuna uparaku se āsuacchi peli | 45 |
ḍāka diai jārā tu re kāhāra kati aṭu
muhiṁ banacara mohora āśrame kinā bheṭu | 46 |
āṣya thāuṁ thauṁ kinā bharasu achu maraṇaku
māriṇa panthāi ki baḷi debi muṁ tuku | 47 |
arjuna boilā āre śuṇasi kirāta
ẏe mohora bhāi mānanta ke kalā śarāghāta | 48 |
arjuna bacana śuṇi jārā śabara ye kope
dhanure nārāja pūroilā guru tāpe | 49 |
ātroṣina śara chāḍante dekhilā phālaguni
śabaraku māilā ye dibya śasra gheni | 50 |
śare śara paḍitāḷa heuṇa achanti
bhājiṇa samasta śahasra cūra hoi yanti | 51 |
śate nārāja chāpe pūroilā jārā
arjuna uparaku bindhalā se kope mahābīrā | 52 |

div.note: gada gada bākye kisa bo kisa bo boli |
ḍaka diai jarā tu re kāhāra suta aṭu
ḍāka diai jārā tu re kāhāra chāṭa aṭu |
ẏe mora prāṇara bhaiṅki kehuṁ kilāhata |

lg.l: śateka nārāja kipe peṣilā arajuna
chedi pakāilā se samasta śara māna | 53 |
kirāta arjuna se hoante anyoanyi
śahasra bighāteṇa ye kampilā medinī | 54 |
kaṣuṇi ṭaṅkāra śubhilā guṇa ghoṣa
tini bhmabanakai lāgilā baḍa trāsa | 55 |
droṇe śuṇile yahuṁ sahasra mānaṅkara bāṇī
karṇṇa bhīma gheni guru dhāiṁle bege puṇi | 56 |
guru dekhile arjuna kirātara samara
jārā arjunaku pūroi acchi lakṣe śara | 57 |
droṇe bheṭile samara karanteṇa beni
kehi kāhāku na ghuñchanti anyoanyi | 58 |
droṇe ḍāka dianti raha raha bābu
kāhāra tahuṁ sādhilu ẏe bidyāmāna sabu | 59 |
kāhāra śiṣa tu ke tohora guru
kāhāra bidyā sādhi tu ẏeḍe yuddha karu | 60 |
kirāta boilā tu śuṇa ho brāhmaṇa
mohora bidyaguru aṭanti hāde droṇa | 61 |
guru thamvībhuta hoile kirāta bacane
āmbhe se droṇa ho bābu aṭu bidyamāne | 62 |
badaẏanti droṇe kāhiṁ achanti tora guru
āmbhaṅku dekhāni tu kāhāku sebā karu | 63 |
āpaṇā ākhaḍa śāḷaku se kaṭāiṇa nelā
māṭira droṇaku ye neiṇa dekhāilā | 64 |
ẏe mohora guru aṭai droṇa siddhā
ẏehāṅku sebiṇa muṁ labhili sabong bidya | 65 |
guru pucchā kale tu kemante sādhya kalu
adr̥ṣṭi aśr̥tire kemante ẏemāna pāilu 66 |
āmbhara mantra baḷe tuhi se māilu | 67 |
lg.note: āmbhara putraṅku ho ki doṣe māilu |
lg.l: bolai kirāta muṁ galaiṁ bāruṇe
boili bidyā mote śikhaa guru droṇe | 68 |
yujheṣṭhi boli jaṇe mote daẏā kalā
droyodhana boli mote tahuṁ bāhāra kari dilā | 69 |
apamāna pāi muṁ ye bāhuḍi aili
bāruṇābantaṭhāru ẏeṭhāku boli banasta kāṭili | 70 |
ākhaḍāẏe bhiāili muṁ pallīra duāre
mr̥ttikā droṇa goṭi muṁ thāpili sādhili sambhare | 71 |
ẏehiṭhāre thāi chāhaṁi muṁ bāruṇābanta ākhaḍaku
dr̥ṣṭipāt karithāiṁ dvādaśa yojanaku | 72 |
yebaṇa pādagati karanti droṇa guru
muṁ ẏethe sādhai ye samasta gati karuṁ | 73 |
śuṇi droṇa guru ye parama sānande
jārākaiṁ āṇi basāile āpaṇā sannidhye | 74 |
āmbhe se droṇa guru aṭu ẏe se bhīma arjuna karṇṇa
yāhāku śaraghāta kalu sehi se driyodhana | 75 |
ẏesana bacana śuṇiṇa bīra jārā
guruṅka pādapadme praḷamba mahābīrā | 76 |
droṇe boile tu āmbhara bidyā putra bābu
se putra māna ye māilu ābhara hiṁ sabu | 77 |
bidyā parīkṣa ẏebe bābu jāṇimā yugate
puṇa se putramāne āmbhara bratanti kemante | 78 |
jārākaiṁ gheni gale se sāṁgrama bhūmiki
kirāta boilā ẏehikṣaṇi guru he jīāṁibi sabhiṅki | 79 |
dhanure basai jībanyāsa śara kalā br̥ṣṭi
moha teji uṭhile se sakaḷa dhr̥tarāṣṭi | 80 |
droṇaṅkara pādapadme hoile pariṇāmi
śabara śaraghāte prāṇatyāja hoilu āmbhe | 81 |
lg.note: se putramāne ye āmbhara jāṇa sabu |
lg.l: tohora parāẏe guru sebi āmbhe bidyāmāna sādhilu
kirāta mātraka samare āmbhe kṣaẏe galu | 82 |
praśurāmaṅkara bidyāku āmbhara guru droṇa
abhābe śikhāil akicchi nohilā kāraṇa | 83 |
dhika hou āmbhara jībana āmbhara chatrī br̥tte kisa kaāryya
kesane jana mukha chāhiṁbu hoiṇa nilajja | 84 |
droṇe boile tumbhe nabhāba kicchi citta
āmbhara bidyā putra ẏe aṭai kirāta | 85 |
ẏekai bidyāẏe dhaṁsi hoile bhrātha beni
ghare ghare ẏeka sodare hoile anyoanyi | 86 |
ẏethaku abhimāna ho kari tana yogāi
āmbhara bidya putra aṭai jāṇa ẏehi | 87 |
gaṇḍā gheni galā ẏe prathame akhaḍaku
tumbhe apamāna kari ye bāhāra karidila ẏehāku | 88 |
droṇaṅkara bacane driyodhana hoilā parama śānti
droṇe boile jārā re tu ẏe bane thaa nibhrānti | 89 |
āmbhe yāuachuṁ hastinā bhmabanaku
bāruṇābantaru bhāṅgi deiṇa ākhaḍāku | 90 |
āmbhara bole tote samasta prāpata hou
tote ta samare jiṇantā kehi nohu āu | 91 |
uṣata hoi paḍilā kirāta guruṅka caraṇe
dakṣiṇā māga ho muku guru debaiṁ ẏehikṣaṇe | 92 |
śuṇiṇa droṇa guru parama sānanda citte
guru dakṣiṇā śiṣyare lāgai yugate | 93 |
satya kale tote māgibi dakṣiṇā
yuge yuge kathā thiba mohora kahaṇā | 94 |
lg.note: ẏethakaiṁ mane na kara tu bhrānti |
lg.l: jārā boilā svāmī satya kali muhiṁ
mohora śirakamaḷa māgile heṁ debaiṁ | 95 |
guru boile tu yebe satya kalu re bābu
dakṣiṇa hasta jyeṣṭha aṅguṣṭhi kāṭi mote debu | 96 |
jyeṣṭha aṅguṣṭhi goṭi dhaile guru ṭāṇi
nārāja bindhante haste na thibaṭi kaṣuṇi | 97 |
chāri aṅguṣṭhire binddhabu tu śara
ẏeteka dile guru dakṣiṇā hoilā āmbhara | 98 |
jārā boilā guru he yebe bhaẏa kala muku
mukuiṁ kaḷaṅka kari uddharila ẏemanaṅku | 99 |
yebaṇa abhimāna kale mote bāruṇābante
se kathā khaṇḍa ka muṁ dharithili hr̥dagate | 100 |
muhiṁ se nāśa karanti driyodhanara bongśa
kurubaḷa mānanta sabunti karanti ye dhvaṁsa | 101 |
jāṇi ta rakṣā kala ẏemānaṅku guru he
parama mahātmā tu sañchilu sandehe | 102 |
ẏete boliṇa ye br̥ddhā aṅguṣṭhi kāṭiṇa se hilā
tāhā dekhi guruṅkara citta haraṣa hoilā | 103 |
jārāku kalyāṇa kari ruhāile nija āśrame
putranta gheni gale bāruṇābanta bhmabane | 104 |
bije kale mahātmā hastinā nagra purī
nija karma bidhāne galā puṇi baraṣa chāri | 105–4043 |
lg.note: yebaṇa abhimāna kale mote bāruṇābanta nagre
se kathā khaṇḍika muṁ dharithili rāge |
lg.head: {@arjunara snāna padārtha āṇibā o nijara astra kuśaḷatā<lb/>darśāi droṇaṅkaṭhāru bara prāpti@}
lg.l: śaṇa ho mahārājā yauṁ dina bidyā parīkṣa kale
sehi dinu kaurobe mane antara dhaile | 1 |
driyodhana mūle ye bichāra karanti
āmbha tahiṁ guruṅkara nāhiṁ śuddhamati | 2 |
droṇe ye āmbhara bidyāguru hoile
ẏekā kari arjunaku se śasra śikhaile | 3 |
āmbhe śate ẏeka uttara bidyāẏe śakatā nohilu
droṇa prāẏe guru thauṁ bidyā na pāilu | 4 |
ẏemante bichāri dhr̥tarīṣta tanaẏe
karṇṇa driyodhana dhuśasana mūḷe guruṅku binaẏe | 5 |
bho guru tumbhe beda śāhāsre sakaḷa nirjitā
praśurāmaṅka bidyāẏe tumbhe trailokya jiṇantā | 6 |
tumbhara manare āmbhaṅku śaddha citta nāhiṁ
ẏekā kari arjunaku śikhāasi gosāiṁ | 7 |
droṇa prāẏe guruṅku āmbhe sebā kalu
bidyā na pāiṇa āmbhe asārthuka ye hoilu | 8 |
droṇe boile yehne āmbhara manda karma
tumbhanta bidyā śikhāi āmbhe hoilu akāraṇa | 9 |
tumbhanta āmbhe bidyā śikhāilu śuddha citte
gaṇṭhi muṭhi dr̥ta kari dekhāuṁ nija gātre | 10 |
hasta dhari tumbhaṅku jaṇe, jaṇe dekhāi
tumbhe tāhā na śikha ye manare gabong bahi | 11 |
tumbhanta bidyā śikhāile arjuna dekhai
dekhiṇa śikhai se kāhākai na pachārai | 12 |
lg.note: tumbhanta bidyā śikhāi āmbhe pāilu apamāna |
lg.l: yebaṇa nārāja dharai phālaguni
mote gocara nuhai se boile droṇa muni | 13 |
praśurāma bidyā tāku hoilā prāpata
dekhiṇa śikhai se bāsabara suta | 14 |
driyodhana boilā tumbhara śuddha citte
teṇu kari samasta kahil abīra pāthe | 15 |
hriyodhana bacane droṇe tunī hele
samaste kurubīre arjunakaiṁ hiṁsā kale | 16 |
ẏethu anantare śuṇa baibasuta manu
bidyāra mahimā ho śuṇa yugarāja tanu | 17 |
ẏeka dinare ye droṇe upāẏeka kale
sabu puanta gheni yamunā snāhāne ye gale | 18 |
bāṭare dekhile susañcha śāḷa br̥kṣe
droṇe boile ẏeṭhāre bujhibā parīkṣe | 19 |
arjunaku boile bābu tu bāhuḍiṇa yibu
kr̥paṅkara gharu snāhāna sañchā ye āṇibu | 20 |
tiḷa aẏeṁḷā susañcha abhyāṅgamāna
bhūiṁre na thoi āmbhaṭhāku āṇibu ye puṇa | 21 |
guruṅkara bacane se caḷilā arjuna
br̥kṣara taḷe yāiṁ miḷile guru droṇa | 22 |
driyodhana beni kara saṅkṣepi dhaile guru droṇa
dr̥ṣṭi muṣṭi gaṇṭhi dr̥ta se kariṇa | 23 |
driyodhana kare guru dile dhanu troṇa | 24 |
katurī nārāja se guṇare basāi
ẏeka dr̥ṣṭire nārāja bindha kurusāiṁ | 25 |
śuṇi driyodhana binddha patramāna kalāka chedana
kurubīramānaṅkara ānanda pañchumana | 26 |
śiṣyanta gheni muni pabeśa yamunāra kūḷe
mathā yogāṇa gheni arjuna se br̥ṣaṭhāre miḷe | 27 |
dekhile br̥kṣare patra goṭiẏeka nāhiṁ
āśrija arjuna se br̥kṣaku puṇa chāhiṁ | 28 |
dekhilā droṇaṅkara paḍicchi pāda gati
arjuna boile gupata bidyā śikhāile kurupati | 29 |
sehimati arjuna pāda gati kalā
pāñchagoṭi nārāja bhūmiki māilā | 30 |
tahiṁra upare snāhāna sañchā thoi
abalokana śara binddhalāka tahiṁ 31 |
bongkṣi goṭimāna ye pakāilā chedi
snāhāna sañchāmāna gheni se caḷai manabhedī | 32 |
guruṅkara sannidhye nei snāhāna sañchā dile
sugandha taiḷa se mathāre lagāile | 33 |
yamunā nadīre se paśile droṇe yāi
samasta śiṣyamāne paśile jhasāi | 34 |
snāhāna karante ye kumbhīreka ailā
droṇa guruṅku se ye ātreṣiṇa nelā | 35 |
samasta śiṣyamāne ḍare aile paḷāi
kumbhīra guruṅku neucchi ghosarāi | 36 |
jaḷaru droṇa guru āsi ta nuārai
rakha rakha boili se śiṣyaṅku ḍāka dei | 37 |
dekhi bhīmasena jaḷa bhitaraku ḍeiṁlā
ātreṣiṇa kari yāiṁ kumbhīraku dhailā | 38 |
bhiḍante jaḷaprabhā se hoilā nidhana
droṇa guru boile dhanya re bhīmasena | 39 |

div.note: rakha, rakha boli se miche ḍāka dei |

lg.l: tuhi se ẏete beḷe dilu jībadāna
kisa dei toṣa kariba tora mana | 40 |
gadā bidyā tote goṭiẏe debaiṁ prasanna
mohora gadā bidyāre tu sakaḷa bhmabana jiṇa | 41 |
baḷarāma gadā bidyā bolanti jagate
āre tora gadā bidyā prakāśu sehi mate | 42 |
atuṭa gadā bidyā droṇe bhīmasenaku dile
trailoka bikhyāta hoa bhīmasenaku boile | 43 |
gadā bidyā pāiṇ ase sānanda bhīmasena
tahuṁṇa puanta gheni groṇe karantai gamana | 44 |
neuṭi guru ye taur taḷe miḷileka yāiṁ
driyodhana boilā se śāḷabr̥kṣaku chāhiṁ | 45 |
āmbhe ye kāṭilu samasta patramāna
bongkṣimānaṅku ke kāṭilā bolai driyodhana | 46 |
droṇe badaẏanti śuṇa re arjuna
tohora nārāja prāẏe tadiśai bidyamāna | 47 |
arjuna boile muṁ kr̥paṅka gharaku gali
snāhāna sañchā gheniṇa muṁ śīghreṇa aili | 48 |
br̥kṣa uparaku muṁ chāhiṁli naẏana
dekhili patramāne bhujire patana | 49 |
nirekhi chāhiṁli muṁ guruṅka pādagati
sehi mati kari muṁ bāgala peṣilaiṁ dhāti | 50 |
bongkṣimāna sabu chedi pakāili bhūmi
śuṇiṇa thambhībhuta drona mahāmuni | 51 |
driyodhana badana chāhiṁ bolanti bacana
ẏe bidyā abā kāhuṁ arjilā arjuna | 52 |
tumbhemāne āmbhaku boluthāa jagate
sabu sahuṁ āmbhe, tumbhe yahuṁ śiṣya putre | 53 |
arjunaku chāhiṁṇa ye boile guru droṇa
ẏe bhārābhar uśvāsibāku tuhiṁ se ye janma | 54 |
dhuśāsana boilā guruhe arjuna āgyāṁ ta meṇṭilā
snāhāna sñchāmāna se bhūmire thoilā | 55 |
arjuna boilā guru he dhuśāsana boilā yemanta
pañchu nārāja bhūmiki māili turita | 56 |
tahiṁ upare ye snāhāna sañchā muṁ thoili
bābala śare sabu bongkṣimāna ta chedili | 57 |
guruṅkara āgyāṁ meṇṭai yebaṇa śiṣa
bidya aprāpata hoi aḷape yāi se nāśa | 58 |
droṇa dekhile nārāja muna basicchi bhūmira
dekhi kari cakita ye hoile kurubīra | 59 |
parama sānanda hoiṇa ānanda pañchumana
sakaḷa bidyā tote hou re arajuna | 60 |
santoṣa hoiṇa arjunaku bara dile
puanta gheni droṇa indrapraśastaku gale | 61 |
lākheka pāti kari śaramāna bindhanti
sehi dinu puṇa hāta pūtra ye karanti | 62 |
yebaṇa nārāja bindhai arjuna
dekhi kurubīraṅkara hr̥daẏa kampamāna | 63 |
kahanti agasti paṇḍita brahmabettā
baibasuta munu śuṇanti amr̥ta rasa kathā | 64 |
namāmi siddha sāroḷā jagkhera pura bāsī
kaḷikāḷa pātaka tohore hoẏe dhaṁsi | 65 |
tu se brahmagyaṁnī anādi aparṇṇā sāroḷā gosāmaṇī
adr̥ṣṭi aśrauti tu bañchāilu āṇi | 66 |

div.note: sehi dinuṁ śara se bindhanti niti pati | (pā)

lg.l: janme janme muhiṁ nohai śāhāsra bādī
paṇḍita jana madhye muṁ na paśili prasiddhi | 67 |
se siddha debī mote prasanna hoilā
akaḷantā śrī mahābhārata mote āgyāṁ dilā | 68 |
jaṅkhera pura bāsinī kr̥pājaḷa nandanī
tāhāra āgyāṁ pramāṇe muṁ hoili śūmuni | 69 |
se siddha debī caraṇe mora sebā
śūdramuni saroḷā dāsaku gati mukti debā | 70-4113 |

div.head: {@droṇaṅka nirdeśare kurupāṇḍabaṅkara dr̥padaṅku<lb/>bandrīkari gheni āsibā@}

lg.l: ẏethu anantare ye baibasuta manu
yāhā pucchā kalu tāhā kahibā sābadhānu | 1 |
mīna śukaḷa ye traẏodaśī arkabāra
hastā nāme nakṣatra ye bhogya se dinara | 2 |
taitulya nāme karaṇa gaṇḍa nāme yoga
meṣa saṅkarāntiki paciśa dina bhoga | 3 |
ākhaḍa śāḷe basi achanti guru droṇe
bhrāthamananta gheni chāmure ubhā kururāṇe | 4 |
droṇe boile bābu he āmbhe aṭuṁ ye tīrthabāsī
tumbhaṅku bidyā debā nimante āmbhe samaẏe rahilu āsi | 5 |
ruṣi bipra bhagabanta ābara brahmachārī
pāda śrame bhrāmanteṇa se dharmaku ācari | 6 |
tumbhe parama kalyāṇa hoithāa kṣame
āmbhe tīrtha yātrā karibu bābu yibuṁ nija dharme | 7 |
driyodhana dhuśāsana ābara bīra karṇṇa
ẏekānte tiāranti bhāadvādaśaṅka nandana | 8 |
yadyapi bidyā ho śikhāilu āmbhe
bhīma arjuna bibādī nohibāka tumbhe | 9 |
tumbhe ẏeka sodar aṭa ye abhinna
yujheṣṭhiṅki bhagati hoi thibaṭi paṇḍura samāna | 10 |
yujheṣṭhiṅkara tule kebe abhāba nohiba re bāḷa
ẏe śirī sampada gheni ghiba sabongkāḷa | 11 |
driyodhana boilā yoḍiṇa beni karapatra
aneka kāḷa bidyā ye śikhāila āmbhanta | 12 |
guru dakṣiṇā māga āmbhe debu ye tubhanta
yāhā ichā māga ho bhagabanta | 13 |
ẏemante keteheṁ dina tahiṁ galā
samasta bhrāthaṅku rāi driyodhana pachārilā 14 |
guru dakṣiṇā debuṁ āmbhanta māgasi ho guru
ye mane ichā debuṁ bāñcchā yāhā karu | 15 |
guru dakṣiṇā na dei sādhanti ye bidyā
se bidyā parāpata nohaiṭi deba siddhā | 16 |
guru boile bābu śuṇa ho dhr̥tarāṣṭi
tu yāhā boilu ẏe kathā satyaṭi | 17 |
āmbhe taḷa hasta kari dāna ghenilu praśurāmaṅka tahuṁ
ānaku dāna āmbhe māgibuṁ abā kāhuṁ | 18 |
bāñcchāguru śikṣāguru kodaṇḍa-dīkṣāguru
kāraṇa puruṣa tahuṁ pratigraha āmbhe karu | 19 |
dhana dāne bhūmi dāne āmbhara nāhiṁ priẏojana
āmbhanta dakṣiṇā deba satya kara dr̥ta mana | 20 |
driyodhana boilā tmbhe yāhā māga tāta
abaśya debu ẏehā āmbhara tribāra satya satya | 21 |

div.note: yujheṣṭhira yebe aprīti hoiba re bāḷa |
ẏehi śirī sampada na rahiba cirakāḷa |

lg.l: droṇe boile bābu he māguachuṁ tumbhaṅku
dropada rājākai dhari āṇi deba muku | 22 |
muhiṁ tumbhara guru tumbhe mohora dulaṇā
ẏeteka dile āmbhaṅku hoiba guru dakṣiṇā | 23 |
śuṇiṇa driyodhana kopeṇa pracaṇḍa
dropada puraku yibā sāja re samadaṇḍa | 24 |
ratha gaja aśva saini pādānti
tola damālu bherī bājai apramiti | 25 |
gaja turaṅga gahane hāboḍanti rathe
chekhāra turaṅgama cati bihaḍanti rāute | 26 |
bīra tūra ṭamaka bijighoṣa bāji
ẏekādaśa kṣauṇī sainya baḷa sāji | 27 |
daṇḍa saja dekhi hasai phālaguni
droṇe boile ẏe tora bichāraku na yogāi kipuṇi | 28 |
arjuna boilā guru he muṁ hasili ẏethaku
ẏeḍe daṇḍa saja kimpe dr̥pada chāraku | 29 |
ye se jaṇe yāiṁ āṇaiṁ ki nā dhari
kiñchita kathāku kimpe ẏeḍe daṇḍa bhiḍi | 30 |
driyodhana boilā tu janmahuṁ ye naṣṭa
yeteka pratagyāṁ kalu sabu garu jyeṣṭha | 31 |
brāhmaṇa guru boli sahile ye tote
bhagyabara hoile nāśa yāāntu kiñchite | 32 |
ẏehi guruṅka chāmure ẏeḍe darpa kathā kahu
aḷapa jāṇi tu ye pratagyāṁ apāra ta bahu | 33 |
āho dropada boli yebaṇa catrabratī
mahā bibeka dhārmika baḷabantā pañchāḷa deśara ādhipati | 34 |
padmeka ratha ye nabasāgara hāthī
chāri parīẏadha aśva naba kṣauṇī pādānti | 35 |
chāri sahasra paridaṇḍa khaṭanti rājā ẏeke
tāhāku dhari āṇimu tu ẏekāi jaṇake | 36 |
bolai bāsabi ye ẏehā nohai akāraṇa
guruṅkara bacna sinā aṭai paramāṇa | 37 |
guruṅkara āgyāṁẏe yebaṇa bacana
tāha se sāra kari śuṇa ho driyodhana | 38 |
droṇe yebe āgyāṁ debeṭi nirutānte
dropada chāraku muṁ āṇibi kṣaṇakara mātre | 39 |
driyodhana boilā dekhi yāa nire bābu
dropadaku āṇile se patagyāṁ sācha sabu | 40 |
ajaṅgama dhanu akṣaẏe troṇa beni
śrīkare droṇe nei dileka phālaguni | 41 |
ẏekā arjuna caḷai guru bākye
śata sahasra daṇḍa paḷamba guruṅkara pāda udake | 42 |
droṇe boile bābu tu hoasi jagujitā
svarga mañcha pātāḷe ke tote nohu nā jiṇantā | 43 |
guruṅka āgyāṁ pramaṇe caḷai dutīkr̥ṣṇa
jagujitā sundara se pratagyāṁ gariṣṭha | 44 |
bana nagra jiṇiṇa se prabeśa pāñchāḷa deśe
kr̥ṣṇabeṇī kūḷe bīra caḷai haraṣe | 45 |
rājyara nikaṭeṇa maḷaẏa nāme giri
tahiṁra śikhare ye bijaẏe dhanurdhārī | 46 |
śie ratnamaṇi mukuṭa kuṇḍaḷa śobhā
śūrabanta sundara rucira chāru prabhā | 47 |
deśāura pucchā kale lakṣaṇa guṇa dekhi sabu
kebaṇa rājāra tu kumara aṭu bābu | 48 |
bolai bāsabi kaha re tumbhara rājāku
dropadara bairī muṁ āsicchi sāṁgrāma karibā ku | 49 |
tumbhe kaha yāiṁ bege gumbhe rājāṅka āgara
daṇḍa gheni āsi karu mora tule ye samara | 50 |
śrībanta lokaṅkara āgyāṁ nohai nā bhraṣṭa
draśane bodha hoi prasanne pūroi peṭa | 51 |
rājāra daṇḍaku ẏekā jaṇaka hiṁ bāhi
śuṇi tāhāra bacana bhra ṣṭa na kale se kehi | 52 |
debārccana sāri rāẏe bijaẏe abakāśe
mantrī amānātyamāne khaṭichanti pāśe | 53 |
deśāura bāratā kahai karapatra yodi
aśakya kathāẏe deba śvaṇimā abadhāri | 54 |
rājāmānaṅkara ye deśāura dibya cachu
sabya asabya kahaṇe mantrī tāhā bāchu | 55 |
deba ! hasteṇa dhanu āra haste śahasreka acchi dhari
yesaneke bidyādhara gaganuṁ abatari | 56 |
bolai bāratā kaha tumbhara rājāku
daṇḍa gheni āsi sāṁgrāma deu muku | 57 |
dropada boile karuṇākara pātraku rāi
kehu aṭai se tumbhe bujhi āsa yāi | 58 |
rājāra bacane ye pātra caḷi galā
ahibateka yoddhā tuleṇa ghenilā | 59 |
āsanti matta nāge dāṇḍare sabonge pūri
nāda śabade ye āsanti jhañjārī | 60 |
dhara, dhara, māra, māra śubhai ghora bobi
jhalakanti lāṅkiẏā ye bāḷa kiraṇa yehne rabi | 61 |
pabongte thāiṇa dekhai kontāṅkara sute
daśa dhāuḍi daśa nārāja binddhale kiñchite | 62 |
dhaḍike āsuthile daśa sahasra matta gaje
ahibrateka hastī paḍile daśa nārāje | 63 |
citāre bāji bāṇa maḷaghara bāṭe nikiḷi
hasī uparu yoddhāẏe paḍile mohe taḷi | 64 |
rājāra agrate yāi kahile munehi
daṇa gheni dropada āpaṇe ailā ye bāhi | 65 |
padmeka ratha batiśa padma hastī
aśī sāgara bārāsa sāta kṣauṇī pādānti | 66 |
dhamanti yoddhāẏe ye siṁha raḍi kari
sāta yojana pariyante thāṭha āsai pūri | 67 |
pabongta upare thāi bichāra karai arjuna
sādhu sampada tora re dropada dhanya to jībana | 68 |
guru āgyāṁ ye dile tote prāṇe māribāku
binā aparādhe kimpe māribi ẏehāku | 69 |
guruṅkara maitra ẏe aṭanti yugate
guru maitra muṁ nāśa karibi kemante | 70 |
sadabhābe mote kahi achanti guru droṇe
manabhedī nārāja bīra kātilāka troṇe | 71 |
mohanā nārāja bhedlā se dropadara | thāṭa
aneka nārāja yāi hoilāka bheṭa | 72 |
rathake sahasa nārāja ye gajake pāñcha śata
aśvake aḍhāi śata pādāntike ẏeka śata | 73 |

div.note: guṇa ṭaṅkāri daṇa nārāja mārilā kiñchite |
citāe bāji bāṇa pacha bāṭeṇa nikiḷi |

lg.l: ẏeteka nārāja ẏekā arjuna ye bhedi
sāta yojana māḍi thāṭha paḍile āchādi | 74 |
moheṇa acebana hoi ye paḍile saini
dropada rājāku yāi dhaile phālaguni | 75 |
dropada boile bābu tu kebaṇa puruṣa
tribhmabane nāhim kāra ẏemanta sāhasa | 76 |
arjuna boile muṁ kointāṅka suta
droṇa guru tahuṁ bidyā śikhili apramita | 77 |
se guru āmbhaṅku dakṣiṇā māgile
dropada rājāku āṇi diasi boile | 78 |
tāhāṅkara bacane muṁ ailaiṁ ẏetha
teṇu kari saini tora kalaiṁ nipāta | 79 |
arjuna boile dropada bhrānti tu na kara ho kicchi
droṇaṅkara śiṣa muṁ tote nemāku āsi acchi | 80 |
mohora thile tote nāhiṁ paramāda
mane bhrānti tumbhe kichu na kara dropada | 81 |
dropada boilā muṁ droha karicchi droṇaṅku
bho arjuna tumbhe ye śaraṇa rakha muku | 82 |
arjuna boile muṁ karibi ẏeka śāsti
guruṅka bacane śiṣye thaāntiṭi bartti | 83 |
ḍora goṭiẏe gheni bānddha ye kara
ẏethaku bho tāta mote kopa ye na kara | 84 |
śāsti dekhiṇa tote daẏā karantu droṇe
cira kopī nohanti se mahāśābtu brāhmaṇe | 85 |

div.note: ẏeteka nārāja ye arjuna hasṇaṁ phiṭi
sāta yojana māḍi paḍile thāṭha goṭi |
guru bacana dile na thāntu nā bartti |

lg.l: dropada boilā yehne tāhāṅkara pratagyāṁ
tohora bacana kesane karibi abagyāṁ | 86 |
āgeṇa dropada pache bīra phālaguni
naba dine caḷi gale yojana śata tini | 87 |
bāruṇābanta se ākhaḍāra nikaṭa
dropadaku bandhana se kalā ḍora pāṭe | 88 |
keśa bāsa asambhāḷa dhūḷire dhūsara
bibaśa bichanna kari dei nelā guruṅka chāmura | 89 |
bāma kare acchi dropadara keśa dhari
ākhaḍā ghare paśila dropadaṅku bāndha kari | 90 |
alaṅka upare guru achanti ye śoi
dropadaku gheni arjuna acchi ubhā hoi | 91 |
guruṅkara nidrā muṁ bhāñjibi kemante
pādataḷe palaṅka khurāre bānddhale dropate | 92 |
āho muhiṁ yauacchi yujheṣṭhi debaṅka chāmura yaẏe
tu ẏethe paḍi rodana karuthaasi ye rāẏe | 93 |
mahābhigyaṁ brāhmaṇa atanti droṇa guru
abastā dekhi tote bichāri daẏa karu | 94 |
nisata hoi tu na paḷāibuṭi dropada
nārāja binddhabi yete dūre thile hoibu śiracheda | 95 |
muiṁ ẏebe bhīṣma, bidura, yujheṣṭhiṅki āṇai rāi
tote pāri kari debuni samaste samaste binoi | 96 |
bāhāra hoi gālāka tahuṁ duti śrīharī
mane bichārai kathāẏe aili pāśori | 97 |
dropada sanya kimpā mohe paḍithibe
se ki āu āsi āmbhaṅku kisa yuddha ye karibe | 98 |
nohai bairi se aṭai brāhmaṇa
kiñchita doṣe yahuṁ āgyāṁ dile guru droṇa | 99 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe ghenile jībanyāsa śara
dropada thāṭhaku jība debu boilā bāsaba kumara | 100 |
āgyāṁ pramāṇe se śara caḷi gālā
tini śata yojane paḍi se samasta jīāṁilā | 101 |
bāhuḍi nārāja āsi arjuna troṇare paśi
sādha sādhu boile se sura svargabāsī | 102 |
dropadara saini moha tejiṇ auṭhile
rājaku bandī kari nela se ye goḷe kale | 103 |
ye yāhā pure se rodadna kale loke
samaẏe jāṇi puṇi śānti hoileka thoke | 104 |
ẏethu anantare ye arjuna caḷi galā
bhīṣma bidura sañjaẏa yujheṣṭhiṅki ruṇḍa kalā | 105 |
dropada bāpuḍāku āṇi acchi dhari
guruṅku kahi samaste heṁ debā pāri kari | 106 |
ẏemantara samaẏe ye karṇṇa driyodhana
śateka bhai tule se kumāra dhuśāsana | 107 |
ākhaḍā śāḷe āsi prabeśa samaste
dekhile bāndhaṇā hoicchi nr̥pati ẏeḍe bhaganaste | 108
dhāiṁṇa bāḷa tāra driyodhana dhailā yāiṁ jhāti
māranti dropadaku deanti aneka śāsti | 109 |
mūrkha dr̥bhāra se duṣṭa dhr̥tarāṣṭi
nārāja gheni dropadaku kalāka sāta beṇṭi | 110 |
māranti leḍā goiṭhā pachabāhā kariṇa ye bānddha
arjuna rakha, rakha boli uñcha svare nr̥pa kāndi | 111 |

div.note: bhaganasta–bhaganaṣṭa, aiśvaryya hāni bā bhagnasthā, bhāṅgi paṛicchi |

lg.l: goḷa śabada śuṇi ciāṁile guur droṇe
dekhile dropadara keśa bāsa asambhāḷane | 112 |
droṇe boile raha raha dhr̥tarāṣṭi
ẏe āmbhara maitra dropadeśvara he ṭi | 113 |
palaṅkare thāiṁ dropadara abastā dekhile
hā hā maitra boli uṭhiṇa koḷa kale | 114 |
tu mohora maitra aṭu pañchubhuta ātmā
na jāṇi apa gañjaṇā pāilu mahātamā | 115 |
śāḍhi saraḷa akṣata guru dileka sambhare
yāa yāa maitra ho tohora nija pure | 116–4229 |

div.head: {@dr̥padaṅkara ḍhapasyā@}

lg.l: chāḍile dropadiku paḷāilā bikaḷe
kāśī nadī bahai hemabanta pabongtara taḷe | 1 |
gaurā tapa karithile se thānare
lajeṇa rājyaku na gale dropada īśvare | 2 |
ẏeḍe abastā hoiṇa rājyaku kemante yibi
amanātya pātraṅka mukha ye kemante chāhiṁbi | 3 |
jībana niāśī rājā basilā ghora tape
chāṛilā rāga, moha, hiṁsā basilā tapodhana rūpe | 4 |
pañcha bhuta nimajji basilā mahārāẏe
rudra debatāṅku japai pajapā mantra laẏe | 5 |
aṇa akṣara nātha ye kr̥pājaḷa sindhu
andhaka bidāraṇa mauḷidhara indu | 6 |
sagsāra darpa bhāñjalā yebaṇa kāmadeba
sadānanda puruṣa tohora nāma sadāśiba | 7 |
brahmāra śāpe deba dahilu anaṅga
aṇākāra puruṣa tu ye dhailu soḍhaḷa aṅga | 8 |
ādi īśāna nātha tuhi se jagata guru
ẏe kaḷikāḷa dhaṁsibāku nātha tuhi se cintā | 9 |
svāmī ẏeka kāẏāku yāhāra pañchuśira
sura pābaka nātha tohora nāma gaṅgādhara | 10 |
sagsāraku sāra tora mahārudra mantre
śaiḷajāra ballabha tu pināka dharu haste | 11 |
saraḷa yebaṇa ye kāḷānaḷa udḍaṅga
kaṭi mekhaḷā se ye ananta bhmajaṅga | 12 |
kāma patana nātha na kalu ẏehā kicchi
ẏeka talaẏe bhajilu yoga laẏe bācchi | 13 |
ẏe sacarācara jība jantu kalu kīṭa poka
ulagnasāhī hoi labhilu trailoka | 14 |
pināka śāraṅga khaṭvāṅga ḍambaru ye haste
ḍāki gahana nāde paḷānti durāpāte | 15 |
pratagyāṁ sārthuka nātha dakṣara yāgabhañjā
kapiḷāsa biharaṇa brahmāra śiragñjā | 16 |
kabandha bidāraṇa tuhi se āhi īśāna
namaste birūpākṣa deba trilocana | 17 |
karuṇākara nātha tailokyacintāmaṇi
koṭiẏe puga gale svāmī nimiṣaka prāẏe maṇi | 18 |
svāmī nīḷakaṇṭha taba śrī caraṇe namāmi
kapiḷāsa siṁghadvāra mote prāpata kara deba svāmī | 19 |

div.note: sura sāiṁ japai nitye, nāma gaṅgādhara |

lg.l: girijā ballabha śrī caraṇa nitye muhiṁ dāsa
kiñchita khaṇḍaṇa karibā nātha kāḷadaṇḍa phāśa | 20 |
śri maheśvara rūpaku śate sahasa daṇḍa pariṇāmi
badaẏanti śāhāsra yoge sāroḷā dāsa śūdra muni | 21–4250

div.head: {@arjunara pratijñā@}

lg.l: agasti kahile ye purāṇa saṅyoge
arjuna pratagyāṁ kahanti ye baibasuta manu āge | 1 |
droṇaṅkara bhāriyā pāka sampādana kari
snāhāna nimante ye yāānti brahmachārī | 2 |
surabhi nadīku snāhāna kariṇa yāuṇa dīrgha pathe
bāṭare tentuḷi br̥kṣeka dekhile bharadvādaśaṅkara sute | 3 |
boile āmbiḷa pallaba hoicchi br̥kṣarāja
begeṇa droṇe peṣale katurī nārāja | 4 |
br̥kṣaru patra yāka jhāḍi pakāile
jāhnabīki boli guru snāhāna kari gāle | 5 |
ẏemanta samaẏe ye arjuna ailā
guruṅka gharaṭhāre prabeśa hoilā | 6 |
arjune pachāle guru gale keṇe
anna tiāra kara bābu guru rale snāhāne | 7 |
ẏete śuṇi bīra sehi pathe gabana
bāṭare dekhile tentuḷi br̥kṣara bebastāmāna | 8 |
caitra māsa nohai ẏeta patra jhāḍā dilā
ẏete boli se br̥kṣarāja katire hoilā | 9 |

div.note: kiñchita khaṇḍaṇa karibā nātha sakaḷa moha pāśa |
kleśa khaṇḍana kara svāmī na yibi nāśakara pāśa |

lg.l: dekhai patra ye nārāje chedana
hr̥dare bichāri bolai droṇaṅka kathāmāna | 10 |
ẏe mahākharāre br̥kṣa heucchi dagadhi
dekhiṇa hr̥dagate manare baḍa trodhī | 11 |
pabanā śareka guṇare basāilā
patramāna uḍāi ye yāha ṭhābare lagāilā | 12 |
mantrabaḷe śukhilā patra kañchā kari
samasta lagāilā nei mantrabaḷa kari | 13 |
ẏete kr̥tya kari bāhuḍa ailā
nija mandire yāi prabeśa hoilā | 14 |
guru snāhāna tarpaṇa bege sāri
bāhuḍi āsante bāṭare br̥kṣa dekhile brahmachārī | 15 |
chāhiṁṇa dekhile muṁ patra jhāḍi ḍāṅga kari yāithili
ẏehā kalā kehu muṁ tāhāku hārili | 16 |
ẏete boli droṇe turite aile
ghare āsi droṇe bhojane basile | 17 |
boile haritā go ẏeṭhāku āsithile kiẏe
boile ẏeṭhāku āsithilā bāsabara poẏe | 18 |
bichāri boile ẏehāra chedana
kāli pachāri bujhibā ẏe kathā arjuna | 19 |
rātra pāhile udaẏa hoile mārataṇḍa
samaste ākhaḍāśāḷe hoileka ruṇḍa | 20 |
guru boile arjuna galu ye āmbhara mandire
āmbhaṅku uddeśi galutu ye gate ye pathare | 21 |
se br̥kṣarājaku bābu kebaṇa kr̥tya kalu
śuṇile kurubīre guruṅka mukharu | 22 |
bābu samasta patra bhāñja sumantrabaḷe gali bhalā
śukhilā kañchā śare pabanā śare uḍāi khañjilā | 23 |

div.note: patramāna uḍāi ye yāhā ḍempare lagāilā |

lg.l: śuṇi kurubīre hoile tarasta
ki jāṇi taiḷa bhāṇḍe paḍilā kīṭa poka | 24 |
bābu tohora uditare kuṭumbe bigraha padiba
abaśya driyodhana yujheṣṭhiṅkara sāṁgrāma hoiba | 25 |
ẏeteka bacana śuṇiṇa dhr̥tarāṣṭi
manare garu cintā bāhāre bhāba tuṣṭi | 26–4276 |

div.head: {@droṇaṅkara praẏāga gamana, aśvathimā o kr̥paṅkara<lb/>tapasyā, daurabaṅka dvārā semānaṅku āṇibā<lb/>o rāmakr̥ṣṇaṅka darśana@}

lg.l: agasti kahile purāṇa saṅyoge
baibasuta manu śuṇanti āsrāge | 1 |
śrī mahābhāratha ẏe ādipabong kathā
sagsāra gati lābha kāẏe mukati artha dātā | 2 |
yebaṇa grantha śuṇile yaśa śirī āẏuṣa baḍhai
śatr̥ kṣaẏe yaẏe araṣṭi darpa ye gañjai | 3 |
droṇa guru kurubīramānaṅkara prtagyāṁ dekhile
nārāẏaṇaṅka agrate baḷarāme ye kahile | 4 |
baḍa sādhane sādhu achanti hastinā
ākhaḍaśāḷa tahiṁ yāi dekhi yibā bhāi kahnā | 5 |
tāḷadhvaja rathe bijaẏe baḷadeba
nandighoṣa rathare bijaẏe mādheba | 6 |
tāḷadhvaja rathare ye subaḷa sārathi
nandighoṣa ratha dāruka bāhai taḍabhi | 7 |
basanta rutu ye hālagunya māsa
śukaḷapakṣa ḍhr̥{?}tīẏā bhr̥gubāra dibasa | 8 |
rebatī nakṣatra ye bāṇijya nāme karaṇa
māhendra yoga gheni bāruṇāku caḷanti kāhnu sagtriṣeṇa | 9 |
droṇe ye gale prāga mahātīrthe
pāchoṭi gale sāta uttara śate bhrathe | 10 |
droṇaṅku nei chāḍile ajaṅgapāda bane
samaste prabeśa hoile kr̥pa aśastamāra tapasthāne | 11 |
dekhile aśasamāra ẏekai āsana
cauda baraṣa hoilā ẏekai niścaḷa naẏana | 12 |
kāhārai nāma ye na dharai tāra mane
śunyaku laẏa kari chāhaṁ i gagane | 13 |
bodhai aṇākāra sādhai brahmagyāna
ẏemante cauda baraṣa ẏeka laẏe mana | 14 |

div.note: āmbhe prāga tīrthaku yibu śuṇa sabong bhāi |
ẏete boli droṇe tīrthaku kale anakūḷa
caḷanti droṇa guru prāẏāga tīrtha baṭa taḷa |
sāta uttara śate bhrātha pāchoṭi puṇa gale
droṇaṅku nei chāḍile ajapā ghora bane |

lg.l: pabana nirodhi ye ṭekai ujāṇi
dvādaśa indriẏa ẏakatva kari āṇi | 15 |
biṁśa āṅguḷa gaṅgā boli śoṣi
ẏethu se nidrā aḷasa nuāsi | 16 |
pañchamunā nāḷa ye tihudira bāṭa
jvāḷānaḷa ṭekilā se śrīhaṭa ye pāṭa | 17 |
kṣandāi pakāilā bāstarī ye mudrā
dhātā dr̥ḍha kariṇa bhāñjilā mahānidrā | 18 |
nidrā puruṣaṭi se aṭai ye kāḷa
ẏehi se nāśa karai sakaḷa | 19 |
pabana ujāṇi yāi nabadvāra bāṭe
tāha sabu bandhana śisumunā bāṭe | 20 |
naba dvāra nirodhi ye basicchi mahātmā
dekhi na dekhai śūnya śabada sīmā | 21 |
hihvā gopyāna kalā se ghaṇṭikāra mūḷe
tahiṁr̥ amr̥ta pana kalā sabongkāḷe | 22 |
sātukī puruṣa se abhaẏe kāḷaku
amāẏā puruṣa se chāhaṁi śūnyaku | 23 |
nāhiṁ nāhiṁ pabana nāhiṁ pañchaśākhā
nāhiṁ nāhiṁ ni aṅga nāhiṁ nā bāṭa rekhā | 24 |
nāhiṁ parasanna nāhiṁ nā aprasanna
jihvā indri gopya kalā nigraha bāsana | 25 |
nirāśita japa yahuṁ kalā aṇākāre
āsana chāḍiṇa ye uṭhile nirākāre | 26 |
śunyeṇa śadda śubhilā bara māta aśastamā
samādhire thāiṁ uttara dile mahātamā | 27 |
śabada śubhai svāmī na diśai śabīra
aṇḍīra kokiḷa jāṇi bāṇī susvara | 28 |
āre kebaṇa bhmabanaku karuachu icchā
bara māga tohora yebaṇa mana bāñcchā | 29 |
aśastamā boilā muṁ utapatti hoili bhmabi
ẏe pr̥thī thibā yāẏe muṁ ẏehimate thibi | 30 |
kāḷa kāma nidrā mote na pīḍiba naẏane
hou tote prapata boli boile deba śūnye | 31 |
kr̥pa āchāryye māgile yehu bara
ẏe pr̥thī thibā yāẏe muhiṁ hoibi amara | 32 |
trijībī hoibi svāmī tohora se bareṇa
hou boli boile śūnya puruṣa śūnyeṇa | 33 |
karapatra yoḍi blai aśastamā
ābara bara mote debu he mahātamā | 34 |
hastinā bhmabane thibāku mora āśa
brahmabeda bidyaẏe muṁ nohibi nirāśa | 35 |
astu hou boli boile deba śūnya
brahmabeda bidyāẏe tumbhe huasi mahāgyānī | 36 |
ẏemanta samaẏe yāi hoile kurubīre
dekhile gata ātmā prāẏe paḍichanti bhūmire | 37 |
aśastamā kr̥pa ye āhāra bihune
uṭhi basi na pāranti ātmabaḷa hīne | 38 |

div.note: āsana chāḍiṇa ye uṭhilā dambha kari |

lg.l: dhuśāsana koḷa kari dhaile aśastamā
kāndheṇa ghenile se kṣatriẏa mahātamā | 39 |
kr̥pa āchāryyaṅku dhaile driyodhana
kāndhe basāile se dhr̥tarāṣṭara nandana | 40 |
gheniṇa āsu achanti bāruṇā praśaste
rāmakr̥ṣṇaṅku bheṭile kaustubha pabongte | 41 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjun asahadeba nakulḷa
praṇapatya hoile baḷadebaṅka paẏara | 42 |
yujheṣṭhidebaṅku kr̥ṣṇa namaskāra kale
kalyāṇa kale dharmarāẏe nr̥patira tule | 43 |
rāmakr̥ṣṇṅku namaskāra na kale kurubīre kehi
aneka aprastuta kathāmāna kahi | 44 |
prabeśa hoile bāruṇābante yāiṁ
aśastamā kr̥paṅku aneka badhāi | 45 |
snāhāna bhojana se kale sabonge tahiṁ
kr̥ṣṇa bhojana kale kointāṅka pure rahi | 46 |
sarpanta mauḷe bahanti deba kāmapāḷa
pabana āhāre se bratanti bratanti sabongkāḷa | 47–4323 |

div.head: {@kaurabaṅkara baḷarāmaṅka ṭhāru gadā bidyāśikṣā,<lb/>arjunaṅkara śikṣā na karibāra kāraṇa kathana |@}

lg.l: saṅtriṣeṇa boile ho droṇa tumbha bidyāguru
ki, ki bidyā śikhāi achanti dekhi parīkṣā āmbhe karu | 1 |
dhanu śahasra bidyā ye dekhile samasta
baḷarāme boile nohilā sādhana gadāhasta | 2 |
baḷarāme gadā ye dhaile āpaṇe
ātraṣaṇa gati kaleka deba saṅtriṣeṇe | 3 |
śūnya pabane gadā bulāile uṭhi
ātraṣaṇa kariṇa ye saṅgharanti deba muṣṭi | 4 |
driyodhana binaẏa bhābeṇa hoilā pariṇāmi
ẏe gadā hasta mote śikhāibā deba svāmī | 5 |
baḷarāme boile āmbha ākhaḍā raibrata pabongte
yāhāra kāryya tahiṁki yāa nitye, nitye | 6 |
arjuna boilā svāmī droṇe ye āmbhara guru
tāṅkara bidyā binuṁ āmbhe āna ye na loḍu | 7 |
ẏeka guruke ye aneka bidyāhoẏe sādhi
byadhi nāśa yāiṭi kale ẏeka mauṣadhi | 8 |
apāra aiṣadhare na barttai rogī
apāra anna khāile nāśa yāi yogī | 9 |
apāra kuṭumbe trodha hoi apārai
apāra pratigrahe brāhmaṇe nāśa yāi | 10 |
apāra buddhireṇa ye kāryya hoẏe hāni
āpaṇe nāśa yāi apāra mata gheni | 11 |
apāra stirī pasaṅga hoile
āẏuṣa kṣaẏe yāi apāra śr̥ṅgāra kale | 12 |
apāra lokare indura nohe māri
apāra tīrtha kale hoai deśāntarī | 13 |
apāra hiṁsāre deha patana ye hoi
apāra lobhare hāde maṅgaḷa tuṭai | 14 |

div.note: rāmara haraṣa beḷe driyodhana bara māgi
ye gadā hasta tora śikhāa mote begi |
āpaṇe nāśa yāi apāra mantra gheni |
āẏu kṣaẏe yāi apāra sādhana hoile |

lg.l: arjuna bhañjalā se apāra kathāku
apāruṁ apāra ye kahilā yogāntaku | 15 |
ẏesaneka kathā śaṇi driyodhana boilā
tumbhara na gale āmbhara kisa ye hoilā | 16 |
āmbhemāne yāiṁ se śikhibuṁ gadabidyā
śuṇi parama santoṣa hoile yogasiddhā | 17 |
bāhuḍi rāma kr̥ṣṇa gale nija deśa
driyodhana yāiṁ nitye raibata pabongtaku
baḷarāmaṅka gadā bidyā sādhana karibāku | 19 |
gadābidyā śikhile se baḷarāmaṅkara saṅgate
gaṇṭhi muṭhi sakaḷa jāṇile śate bhrāthe | 20–4343 |
lg.head: {@bhānumatī bibāha@}
lg.l: śuṇa ho rājana bijaẏa nagra goliṇa se dakṣiṇa kośaḷe
bhūmanu boli kari tahiṁra mahīpāḷe | 1 |
tāhāra bhīriyā nāma bhmabanābatī
tāhāra duhitāra nāma hoilā bhānumatī | 2 |
baḍāi sundara se aṭai mahāgyānī
bedaśāsra nirjita ye aṭai puṇyamānī | 3 |
mātāra tahuṁ se ye kalā kṣīra pāna
kṣīra āhāre bratai na bhmañjai anna | 4 |
debāṅga basana ye pindhai pugate
na paḍhiṇa śāsra se bakhāṇu thāẏe niḍhye | 5 |
kokiḷa dhuni susvare bhāṣai dibya rase
bitakṣaṇa sundarī se nāhiṁ nā ākāśe | 6 |
lg.note: kṣira āhāruṁ se na loḍai āna |
lg.l: bhūmanu pachārai go stirī janma tuhi
kāhāku pradāna go karibāka āẏi | 7 |
śaṇiṇa bacana ye bolai bhanumatī
tu mote bimukha noha muṁ aṭai mahāsatī | 8 |
āmbhe chārikanyā śūnyara ye debatī
dvāpara yuge āsi madhya bhmabane utapatti | 9 |
satya yuge āmbhe rati ahilā damantī bedamatī
trotaẏāre sītā tārā sābitrī indumatī | 10 |
dvāpare āmbhe janmilu rebatī rukmaṇī
bhanumatī deopatī āmbhe chāri ye bhaẏeṇī | 11 |
tumbhe āmbhaṅgu bimukha nohasi ho tāta
mari na mari āmbhe kautuke hou jāta | 12 |
āmbhara yetebeḷe tāta hoibaṭi ichā
tohora āgare kahibu yehne mana bāñcchā | 13 |
ẏehu bacaneṇa samaẏeka galā
śaẏe cauṣaṭhī baraṣa sampūrṇṇa hoilā | 14 |
bāḷūta bhābeṇa se kheḷai kumārī
puṇihiṁ bhūmanu duhitāku pachāri | 15 |
māgo keheneka āgyāṁ debu nāhiṁ ki mote
kāhākai pradāna karibaiṁ tote | 16 |
bhānumatī boilā yebe hoilu ārata
rājānta āṇi saẏambara kara tāta | 17 |
duhitāra bacane ghāṣilā nr̥pamaṇi
dhanabanta rājā muṁ go nohai dulaṇi | 18 |
lakṣe nr̥pati ye achanti pr̥thibīre
saẏaṁbara kale āsibe sabu nr̥pabare | 19 |
yāhāku nuāṇibi se hoiba abaraṇa
dharma nāśa yiba kāryya hoiba akāraṇa | 20 |
lg.note: satyayuge ahalyā ye arundhatī rati damaẏantī |
lg.l: satya yuge yāga kale jamadaagni mahāyati
sahasrā arjunaku na bari barile sabunti | 21 |
ẏekā jaṇaka se dhāḍi dilāka yagyaṁkāḷe
śahasra ghāẏe paḷāile ye samasta mahīpāḷe | 22 |
jamadaagnira se āsi chedlāka śira
yāga bhāñjiṇa se samasta kalā jūra | 23 |
saẏaṁbara kale se samasta loka āsi yāi
kāraya nohai se āpaṇe nāśa yāi | 24 |
bhānumatī boilā tāta saẏambara yāga kale
dharma nāśa yāiṁ jaṇeka hiṁ nabarile | 25 |
bhūmanu boilā muṁ aṭai dhanahīna
ẏete sanyaku mā go kāhuṁ debi anna | 26 |
bhānumatī boile tāta dhanaku na karasi cintā
muhiṁ se tote ho dhana anna ye diantā | 27 |
bhūmanu boile muṁ samprate kehne yibi
parīkṣa dekhile muṁ triputi hoibi | 28 |
yogāḍa goṭiẏe tāta nirmita tumbhe kara
mohora mantra pāṇi phuṭiẏeka bhara | 29 |
se pāga rānddhale hoiba amiẏa rasa
samadaṇḍa sanya tohora ichāẏeṇa paraśa | 30 |
lakṣeka rājāra yeteka saini
icchāẏe bhmañjantu tāta ye yāhā thāṭha sainya gheni | 31 |
parīkṣa nimante debī mantra pāṇi dilā
nija pāke nei bhūmanu basāilā | 32 |
amr̥ta rasa pāga hoilā yugate
paraśile na sarai saini baḷa yete | 33 |
ẏekādaśa kṣauṇī rājāra aṭai thāṭha
ẏekā yogāḍake samastaṅku anna na yelā niaṇṭa | 34 |
bhūmanu boilā mā go ẏe baḍa dulabha
ẏe madhya bhmabane nāhiṁ go ẏesaneka sulabha | 35 |
ẏemanta prasannaku aṭu atuṭāi
keuṁṇa puṇya baḷe ẏesaneka bhiāi | 36 |
duhitā pratibāca tāta śuṇimā bhūapati
brahmāṅkara bhāriyā aṭai sābitrī | 37 |
āmbhe sāta kanyā tāhāṅkara paribārī
rebatī rukmaṇī bhānumatī dropadī ādi kari | 38 |
arundhatī añjanā kamaḷā gheni sāta
se brahmāẏeṇī prasanne āmbhaṅku rāndhaṇā bidyā parāpata | 39 |
bhūmanu boilā ma go miḷāilu anna
dhana na thile nohai abichane dāna | 40 |
bhānumatī boilā tāta dhanaku na kara cintā
yete dhana māgu tāta muṁhi se diantā | 41 |
bhūmanu boile mā go parīkṣaku mote dekhāibu nā kāraṇa
parīkṣa dile saẏaṁbaraku svīkāra karibi ẏehikṣaṇa | 42 |
bhānumatī boilā tāta ẏehi se pāṣāṇa
dharā dhari kariṇa mohora chāmuku āṇa | 43 |
sāta sāṅgī lāgilā dr̥ḍha kari
bhānumatī chāmure āṇi thoile thira kari | 44 |
bhānumatī ḍāhāṇa kara ghaṣilā pāṣāṇe
agnihuṁ uttāra ratna hoilā tatakṣaṇe | 45 |
dekhiṇa āśrija ye bhumanu narapati
pratakṣe lakṣmī mā go hoichu utapatti | 46 |
bhānumatī boilā tāta mora janme janme ẏe siddhi
dui hāthe acchi mora śagkha padmanidhi | 47 |
lg.note: bhūmanu boilā mā go miḷilā ẏebe anna |
agni huṁ teja se subarṇṇa hoilā tatakṣaṇe |
pāṇi drabya utapatti pāṣaṇa hoilā tatakṣaṇe |
lg.l: māṁkaḍā pathare lagāile mora kara
yauṁ ratna icchiba sehi hoiba pāṇidrabya sāra | 48 |
kanya māsa śukaḷa pakṣa daśamī ye tithi
śarada ucchaba anteṇa aparājitā pābongtī | 49 |
paṇḍita bāra ye śrabaṇā nakṣatre
saẏaṁbaraku anakūḷa ghenai bhūmanu nr̥patye | 50 |
śūdraka nāmeṇa tāra mantīki tatakṣaṇe rāi
rājānta nimntraṇa kara saẏaṁbara kr̥tya kahi | 51 |
śudraka mantrīśuṇi aneka haraṣa
deśāura peṣilā se chāridiga pāśa | 52 |
bhānumatī sādriśe citrapaṭeka lihilā
rājāṅku dekhāibāku se sandeśa bhiāilā | 53 |
mantrīra bacane ye caḷile sabong dūte
rājānta nimantraṇa karanti turite | 54 |
bhānumatīra saẏaṁbara boliṇa jaṇāiṁ
lekhana citrapaṭi chāmure dekhāiṁ | 55 |
bhānumatīra chāmuku rājā āṇaiṁ pāṣāṇa sabong
tāhāra kara lāgante hoai pāṇidrabya | 56 |
ẏemante rājāra aneka pāṇidrabya hoilā
nabara bhaṇḍāramāna ye thoite ṭhāba nohilā | 57 |
biśvakarmā mūḷe aneka drabya bāṇṭi
chāẏā maṇḍopake upāẏe kariṇa ghaṭi | 58 |
chāẏā maṇḍopa bhiāilā śabha yoge
chatra gharamāna rājā bhiāilā bege, bege | 59 |
aśvaśāḷa gajaśāḷa nadī kūḷe toḷāi
subarṇṇara kaḷasa rājā ghare, ghare basāi | 60 |
netara patāṅga uḍai pharahara
kadaḷī troṇā ye ubhāranti dvāra dvāra | 61 |
aśī padma ghara ye bhūmanu rājāra nagrare
bijaẏā maṇḍaḷa bhūmanu rājā maṇḍai sambhabongre | 62 |
yesaneka bhūmanu pura diśai indra bārasvatī
ki se bhmabana diśai aḷakāpura jyoti | 63 |
akṣata pāiṇa āsanti rājāgaṇama ne
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ bijaẏā nagra thāne | 64 |
pādāarghya pādāsana gheniṇa bhūmanu rājā
samasta nr̥patimānaṅku karai pāda pūjā | 65 |
kaḷiṅga uḍaṅka baṅga ye telaṅga
khāñjaṇa deśa ye tihaḍi deśabhāga | 66 |
cira deśa bīra deśa mahātiraṇa deśa
bhoṭa deśa mandāra deśa kāuṁrī ye deśa | 67 |
maṅgaḷā deśa ḍāhāḷa deśa deśa belāuḷa
kṣīraṇa deśa khecara deśa deśa ye bhūpāḷa | 68 |
māḷaba deśa gurjara deśa deśa marahaṭa
magadha deśa matsya deśa, deśa ye gujurāṭa | 69 |
kāśī deśa kaUśika deśa, deśa ye kubuja
ujjaẏinī deśa pārijāta kanāUja | 70 |
kṣetra deśa, bikṣetra deśa, deśa ye gāndhāra
nīḷa deśa, anīḷa deśa, deśa ye nepāḷa | 71 |
śākhā maṇḍaḷa bhākhā maṇḍaḷa bajragiri maṇḍaḷa
śoṇita maṇḍaḷa ye kaṇaẏa maṇḍḷa | 72 |
meru maṇḍaḷa rājā āsanti sakaḷa maḷaẏa maṇḍaḷa
mandara maṇḍaḷa ābara padma ye maṇḍaḷa | 63 |
lg.note: śākhā maṇḍaḷa bhākhā maṇḍaḷa biṁjhagiri maṇḍaḷa |
lg.l: kośaḷa maṇḍaḷa yājanagra maṇḍaḷa
amara maṇḍaḷa kuñjagaḷa maṇḍaḷa | 74 |
bāruṇā maṇḍaḷa indra-praśasta maṇḍaḷa | 75 |
ẏemante chatiśa maṇḍaḷa jambudvīpa pr̥thī
bāra raṣṭra kariṇa ẏehā bhiāile yayāti | 76 |
rīra malla siṁha malla apramita rāṣṭra
citra rāṣṭra ye jaḷantara rāṣra | 77 |
bhānu rāṣṭra ādi ābara yete rāṣṭra
ayodhyā rāṣṭra bindhyāmāḷa rāṣṭra siṁha rāṣṭra | 78 |
paśacime soma rāṣṭra dakṣiṇe uḍa rāṣṭra
madhubana rāṣṭra kaṇaẏa saurāṣṭra | 79 |
ẏemante bāra rāṣṭra bhiāṇa ye mūḷe
rāṣṭrapatimāne bhiāile sabongkāḷe | 80 |
kāmapura nagrī ye ujāṇa nagrī
pāroḷā nāme nagrī ye yājana nagrī | 81 |
kāñthī nagrī, ruda nagrī ye hoḷa nāme nagrī
baḍabānaḷa nagrī bijaẏā nāme nagrī | 82 |

div.note: bhmajaṅga, cuḍaṅga, bijepura, gaurī, karṇṇāṭa, kāśmīra, nirjhara,<lb/>utkaḷa, pāñchāḷa, śobhāṅga, bicitra, soma deśa, bipada, dr̥ṣṭānta,<lb/>(durānta, dr̥śanta) ẏehi deśamānaṅkara nāma dui khaṇḍa pothire<lb/>adhikā acchi, kintu uddhr̥ta mūḷa pātha anya pothimānaṅkare samāna |

maṇḍaḷamānaṅka madhyaru–daṇḍa, madhu, sukānti, ude, kṣīṇa, gamaẏa,<lb/>puṇya, śaurī, komara, aṭaḷa siṁha, sujana, choḷa, pāṇi, himabanta<lb/>nareśvara, suḍhaḷa,–goṭiẏe goṭiẏe pothire adhikā acchi |<lb/>bhāskara, dhr̥ti, dhamānta–chapā bahire adhika |
rāṣṭra madhyare–kerirāṣṭra, bīramaẏa, apramita, biṁkhita, jaḷaturaṅga,<lb/>ghoṭa, bāunu birāṣṭra, mandabaḷa, anumati, kiẏā, amita, jita,<lb/>bhoṭa, ajamita |
ẏe rūpe bāra rāṣṭra ye bhiāṇa maṇḍaḷe

lg.l: kuṇḍa nagrī beda nagrī ye māhendra nāme nagrī
hiṁjaḷa nāme nagrī kondrābai nāme nagrī | 83 |
padmadaḷa nagrī, biṣṇu nagrī, sura nagrī, brahmadhātu nagrī
jambudvīpa nagrī, bhoja nagrī, anubhaba nāme nagrī | 84 |
ẏe nagramānaṅkara yeteka nr̥pati
bhūmanu rājye bije kale sakaḷa ādhipati | 85 |
dakṣiṇe mahodadhi kośaḷa paścime somarāṣṭra kośaḷa
bheraba kośaḷa ye kāuṁrī kośaḷa | 86 |
arabinda kośaḷa biṁjhamāḷa kośaḷa
uttara kośaḷa ye matsadeśa kośaḷa | 87 |
meru kośaḷa kusuma satyāniḷa kośaḷa | 88 |
bhānumatī kośaḷa ye udaẏagiri kośaḷa
īśānya bhāge base chāri ye kośaḷa | 89 |
jaḷa taraṅga kośaḷa phālaguna kośaḷa purī
ajaṅga kośaḷa cuḍaṅga kośaḷa chari | 90 |
sthaḷaraṅga kośaḷa phalukī ye anantāi kośaḷa
ẏemante āsanti kośaḷa adhikārī sakaḷa | 91 |
kośaḷādhipatimāne daṇḍa chatra gheni
bhānumatī deśe prabeśa ye yāhā sanya gheni | 92 |
uttara dakṣiṇa pūbong paścima diga chāri
samasta deśaru ye āsanti daṇḍadhārī | 93 |
lg.note: mudrita pustakare–nīḷa, anīḷa, yenābaḷī, mathurā, suḍhaḷa,<lb/>yamunā, khaṇḍapura, bindhyabara, subaḷaẏa, bitāḷa, kanakhaḷa o mekhaḷa<lb/>prabhr̥ti nagaramānaṅkara nāma acchi | kintu prāpta pothimānaṅkare<lb/>ẏemānaṅkara nāma nāhiñ | punaśca keteka pothire manamukhī<lb/>nāma acchi |
lg.l: sabunti ẏeka sarūpe rāẏe karanti pūjā
bara beśe maṅgaḷe bijaẏe sabong rājā | 94 |
samasta nr̥patiṅgi kaneka siṁghāsana
kareṇa ratna dei rājā karai sanamāna | 95 |
pacchime dui ūṇā pañchāśa sahasra nr̥pati
uttare ẏeka ūṇā chāḷi śa sahasra nr̥pati | 96 |
pūbong dige ẏeka ūṇā sāta sahasra rājana
dakṣiṇe tini sahasra rājā basanti bidyamāna | 97 |
ẏemante ye chāri ūṇā lakṣeka nr̥pati
bhānumatī deśe āsi samaste miḷanti | 98 |
brahma, kṣatriẏa, baśya, śūdra jāti chāri
dratya dānab rākṣasa piśāca ādi kari | 99 |
kandha, mahlāra, kirāta, babongra nr̥pati
gandhabong, yakṣa, kinnara, bhūpāḷa bārasvatī | 100 |
kanāuja, mahārāṣṭr, telaṅga, mahabhākhā
uḍaṅga, khāñjaṇa gheni aṣṭādaśa barga lekhā | 101 |
samasta rājāmāne ye yāhāra sanya tule
ratha gaja aśva gheni sambhare bije kale | 102 |
dekhiṇa sānanda ye jambusenara bāḷa
samasta rājāṅku dilā baraṇa ratna māḷa | 103 |
aneka sūpakāra randhana karanti chatraśāḷe
nityakarma sāri muṇohiṁ karanti sakaḷa mahīpāḷe | 104 |
rājānta samārji se bhūmanu nr̥pati
āpaṇe bije kale yahiṁ acchi duhitā bhānumatī | 105 |
binaẏa bhāba hoi se pachāre nr̥pati
mā go tohora āgyāṁẏe aṇāili rājā sabunti | 106 |
bolai kebaṇa bidhāna heba kaha tathya kari
māḷa goṭiẏe gheni go tohora icchāẏe bara bari | 107 |
aneka sambhabonge ye bije kale nr̥pa
tuhi se bāribu nā rājāṅkara bitakṣaṇa rūpa | 108 |
bhānumatī boilā tāta bichāra kara tora buddhi
kebaṇa rājā kare acchi śaṅkha padmanidhi | 109 |
se rājāku pradāna karibu tāta mote
bhūmanu boilā mā go tāhā muṁ jāṇimi kemante | 110 |
tu go māta dekha yāi rājāṅkara barṇṇa cihna
tu parama māheśvarī se sabu tote dr̥śyamāna | 111 |
duhitāra bacane caḷai bhūmanu
